attribute.description_zh: Doorbell内部SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: A multi-bit ECC error occurs in the SRAM of the Doorbell.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: TS子系统异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，可参考如下命令进行复位（$i为指定设备ID)：
npu-smi set -t reset -i $i -c 0
2. 如果复位无法解决，建议使用msnpureport工具收集NPU日志，联系华为工程师处理；
3. NPU日志收集参考：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/800/developmentguide/maintenref/logreference/logreference_0024.html
4. 如果故障持续，建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The TS subsystem is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC by running the following command ($i indicates the specified device ID):
npu-smi set -t reset -i $i -c 0
2. If the problem persists, use the msnpureport tool to collect NPU logs and contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 子图调度子系统异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，可参考如下命令进行复位（$i为指定设备ID)：
npu-smi set -t reset -i $i -c 0
2. 如果复位无法解决，建议使用msnpureport工具收集NPU日志，联系华为工程师处理；
3. NPU日志收集参考：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/800/developmentguide/maintenref/logreference/logreference_0024.html
4. 如果故障持续，建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The subsystem for subgraph scheduling does not work properly.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC by running the following command ($i indicates the specified device ID):
npu-smi set -t reset -i $i -c 0
2. If the problem persists, use the msnpureport tool to collect NPU logs and contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: L3D片内SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，可参考如下命令进行复位（$i为指定设备ID)：
npu-smi set -t reset -i $i -c 0
2. 如果复位无法解决，建议使用msnpureport工具收集NPU日志，联系华为工程师处理；
3. NPU日志收集参考：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/800/developmentguide/maintenref/logreference/logreference_0024.html
4.如果故障持续，建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: L3D on-chip SRAM multi-bit ECC error occurs.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC by running the following command ($i indicates the specified device ID):
npu-smi set -t reset -i $i -c 0
2. If the problem persists, use the msnpureport tool to collect NPU logs and contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: HBM用户内存空间内存颗粒访问多bit ECC错误携带HostPID
attribute.description_zh: 上游访问用户内存空间HBM触发的多bit ECC错误，可能原因为HBM颗粒部分失效，发送通知事件携带HostPID。
suggestion_zh: 1.发生HBM多比特ECC错误，建议使用ascend-dmi工具检测HBM健康状态：
a.若告警级别为"EMERGENCY_WARN"，建议更换备件；
b.若告警级别为"IMPORTANT_WARN"，建议重启系统，复位npu芯片；
c.若告警级别为"GENERAL_WARN"，建议退出AI任务重新执行；
attribute.cause_en: Multi-bit ECC errors carrying HostPID when accessing the HBM
attribute.description_en: A multi-bit ECC error is triggered when the upstream accesses the high bandwidth memory in a user memory space. The possible cause is that high bandwidth memory chips are partially faulty, and the notification event carries the HostPID.
suggestion_en: 1. Multi-bit ECC error occurs on the HBM, use the pressure test tool to check the HBM health status.
a. If the alarm severity is EMERGwards_WARN, replace the spare part.
b. If the alarm severity is IMPORTANT_WARN, restart the system and reset the NPU chip.
c. If the alarm severity is "COMPAL_WARN", exit the AI task and perform the task again.

attribute.cause_zh: HBM用户内存空间内存颗粒访问多bit ECC错误
attribute.description_zh: HBM内存空间被访问，触发多bit ECC错误且地址热隔离失败，可能原因为HBM颗粒部分失效且失效地址仍被占用。
suggestion_zh: 1. 如上报host pid为零，建议复位SOC；
2. 如上报host pid非零，kill进程，等待一个恢复时长后，如故障仍不恢复，建议复位SOC；
attribute.cause_en: Multi-bit ECC errors when accessing the HBM
attribute.description_en: A multi-bit ECC error is triggered and address thermal isolation fails when the high bandwidth memory space is accessed. The possible cause is that high bandwidth memory chips are partially faulty, and the invalid address is still occupied.
suggestion_en: 1. If the reported host pid is 0, reset the SoC.
2. If the reported host pid is not zero, kill the process and wait for a period of time. If the fault persists, reset the SoC.

attribute.cause_zh: HBM内存颗粒巡检多bit ECC错误
attribute.description_zh: HBMC巡检（Patrol Scrubbing和Demand Scrubbing）触发的多bit ECC错误，可能原因为HBM颗粒部分失效、HBM无法正常保持数据等。
suggestion_zh: 1. HBM内存颗粒巡检发现多bit ECC错误，建议使用ascend-dmi工具检测HBM健康状态：
a.若告警级别为"EMERGENCY_WARN"，建议更换备件；
b.若告警级别为"IMPORTANT_WARN"，建议重启系统，复位npu芯片；
c.若告警级别为"GENERAL_WARN"，建议退出AI任务重新执行；
attribute.cause_en: Multi-bit ECC errors occur during the HBM patrol
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors are triggered during HBMC patrol scrubbing and demand scrubbing. The possible causes may be that some HBM chips fail or the HBM cannot store data properly.
suggestion_en: 1. Multi-bit ECC errors are found in the preventive maintenance inspection. It is advised to use the pressure test tool to check the health status of the HBM.
a. If the alarm severity is "EMERGENCY_WARN", you are advised to replace the spare part.
b. If the alarm severity is IMPORTANT_WARN, restart the system and reset the NPU chip.
c. If the alarm severity is "GENERAL_WARN", exit the AI task and perform the task again.

attribute.cause_zh: 单个Device的HBM多bit ECC隔离行数达到或超过16个
attribute.description_zh: HBM总的多bit ECC隔离行数达到或超过16个。
suggestion_zh: 1. 设备HBM总的多bit ECC隔离地址记录达到16个，建议退出AI任务重新执行；
2. 如果无法解决，建议重启系统，复位npu芯片；
attribute.cause_en: The number of multi-bit ECC isolation lines of the high bandwidth memory on a single device reaches or exceeds 16
attribute.description_en: The total number of multi-bit ECC isolation lines of the high bandwidth memory reaches or exceeds 16.
suggestion_en: 1. If the total number of multi-bit ECC isolation address records of the HBM reaches 16, it is advised to exit the AI task and re-execute it.
2. If the problem persists, restart the system and reset the NPU chip.

attribute.cause_zh: 设备的HBM总的多bit ECC隔离行数达到64个
attribute.description_zh: HBM总的多bit ECC隔离行数达到64个。
suggestion_zh: 1. 设备的HBM总的多bit ECC隔离行数达到64个，建议送厂返修；
attribute.cause_en: The total number of multi-bit ECC isolation lines of the high bandwidth memory reaches 64
attribute.description_en: The total number of multi-bit ECC isolation lines of the high bandwidth memory reaches 64.
suggestion_en: 1. The total number of multi-bit ECC isolation lines of the HBM reaches 64. It is recommended that the HBM be sent back to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: HBM器件反馈致命高温告警。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议及时下电降温，检查系统散热情况，加强散热，降低芯片温度；
2. 如果不能降低温度，建议硬件送修；
attribute.description_en: The HBM component reports a fatal high temperature alarm.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to power off the system in time to cool the temperature. Check the system heat dissipation and enhance heat dissipation to reduce the chip temperature.
2. If the temperature cannot be lowered, send the hardware for repair.

attribute.description_zh: HBM器件反馈超过95℃高温告警。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议检查系统散热情况，加强散热，降低芯片温度；
2. 如果不能降低温度，建议重启SOC后重新检测温度，此时还不能降温，建议硬件送修；
attribute.description_en: The HBM component reports an alarm indicating that the temperature exceeds 95°C.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to check the system heat dissipation, strengthen heat dissipation, and lower the chip temperature.
2. If the temperature cannot be lowered, restart the SoC and check the temperature again. If the temperature cannot be lowered, send the hardware for repair.

attribute.description_zh: HBMC Parity错误，包括CA和DQ Parity错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议退出AI任务重新执行；
2. 如果再次碰到故障，建议重启SoC，再次执行AI业务；
3. 如果故障持续，建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: HBMC parity errors, including CA and DQ parity errors.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and execute it again.
2. If the fault occurs again, restart the SoC and perform the AI service again.
3. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: HBMC内部SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，可参考如下命令进行复位（$i为指定设备ID)：
npu-smi set -t reset -i $i -c 0
2. 如果复位无法解决，建议使用msnpureport工具收集NPU日志，联系华为工程师处理；
3. NPU日志收集参考：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/800/developmentguide/maintenref/logreference/logreference_0024.html
4. 如果故障持续，建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors in the SRAM of HBMC.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC by running the following command ($i indicates the specified device ID):
npu-smi set -t reset -i $i -c 0
2. If the problem persists, use the msnpureport tool to collect NPU logs and contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: HBMC模块内部故障，包括超过欠刷新个数等。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: An internal fault occurs to the HBMC module, for example, the number of under-refresh times exceeds the upper limit.
suggestion_en: 1. You are advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return to the factory for repair.

attribute.cause_zh: HBMC同上下游交互超时异常
attribute.description_zh: HBMC同上下游（mesh、ring、hha等）交互超时错误，包括PHY读数据超时、DFI接口超时不返回等。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: The interaction between the HBMC and upstream/downstream devices times out
attribute.description_en: Timeout errors occur when the HBMC interacts with upstream or downstream devices (such as mesh, ring, and hha). For example, the PHY read data times out, or the DFI interface does not return a response due to timeout.
suggestion_en: 1. You are advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: a.网口芯片检测到自身link状态故障；b.网口芯片检测到对端link状态故障。（若网口状态及时恢复，可能不会影响业务）
suggestion_zh: 1. 请检查网口状态是否正常，可参考如下命令恢复网口link状态（$i为指定设备ID)：hccn_tool -i $i -cfg recovery
2. 可参考如下命令查看历史闪断记录（$i为指定设备ID)：hccn_tool -i $i -link_stat -g
3. 若网口断开时间过长，建议隔离节点，联系物理网络运维同事，收集交换机日志信息，并排查有无硬件问题（光模块是否在位、交换机链路是否闪断等）；
4. 若网口状态及时恢复成UP，该故障可能不是任务失败的问题根因，不会导致任务中断，建议优先排查其他故障；
attribute.description_en: a. The network port chip detects that its link status is faulty. b. The network port chip detects that the peer link is faulty. (If the network port status is restored in a timely manner, the service may not be affected.)
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the network port status is normal. Run the hccn_tool -i $i -cfg recovery command to restore the link status of the network port. In the command, $i indicates the device ID.
2. Run the following command to view historical intermittent disconnection records ($i indicates the specified device ID): hccn_tool -i $i -link_stat -g

3. If the network port remains disconnected for an extended period, it is recommended to isolate the node, contact colleagues responsible for physical network operation and maintenance, collect switch log information, and troubleshoot any hardware issues. (Check whether the optical module is in position and whether the switch link is intermittently disconnected).

4. If the network port status is recovered to UP in time, the fault may not be the root cause of the task failure and will not cause the task to be interrupted. It is advised to check other faults first.

attribute.description_zh: NIC的SSU各MEMORY多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors occur in each SSU memory of the NIC.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and re-execute it.
2. If the AI task fails to be executed again, reset the SoC. If the fault persists, send the return to the hardware factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: NIC模块SSU异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The SSU of the NIC module is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and re-execute it.
2. If the AI task fails to be executed again, reset the SoC. If the fault persists, send the return to the hardware factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: NIC总线访问异常，读BD总线返回poison。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC；
3. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The NIC bus access is abnormal, and poison is returned when the BD bus is read.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and re-execute it.
2. If the AI task fails to be executed again, reset the SoC. If the fault persists, send the return to the hardware factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: NIC内部软件配置错误，多播复制份数异常、SSU PKT BUFF高低水线配置出错等。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC；
3. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: Incorrect internal software configuration of NIC
attribute.description_en: The internal software configuration of the NIC is incorrect. For example, the number of multicast copies is abnormal, or the upper and lower thresholds of the SSU packet buffer are incorrectly configured.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and re-execute it.
2. If the AI task fails to be executed again, reset the SoC. If the fault persists, send the return to the hardware factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若故障没有恢复，则建议复位SOC；
2. 若恢复则建议AI任务退出重新执行；
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (due to insufficient permission or resources), exits abnormally (due to insufficient resources), or fails to respond (due to insufficient resources).
suggestion_en: 1. If the fault persists, reset the SoC.
2. If the AI task is recovered, exit the AI task and execute it again.

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若没有恢复则建议空闲复位SOC，若恢复则无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (due to insufficient permission or resources), exits abnormally (due to insufficient resources), or fails to respond (due to insufficient resources).
suggestion_en: 1. If the fault persists, reset the SoC in idle mode. If the fault persists, no operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议立即复位SOC；
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (due to insufficient permission or resources), exits abnormally (due to insufficient resources), or fails to respond (due to insufficient resources).
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SoC immediately.

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若能自恢复，建议退出AI任务重新执行；
2. 如果不能自恢复，可参考如下命令立即恢复SOC（$i为指定设备ID)：
npu-smi set -t reset -i $i -c 0
3. 如果复位无法解决，建议使用msnpureport工具收集NPU日志，联系华为工程师处理；
4. NPU日志收集参考：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/800/developmentguide/maintenref/logreference/logreference_0024.html
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (due to insufficient permission or resources), exits abnormally (due to insufficient resources), or fails to respond (due to insufficient resources).
suggestion_en: 1. If the AI task can be automatically recovered, exit the AI task and perform it again.
2. If the self-recovery fails, run the following command to restore the SoC immediately ($i indicates the device ID):
npu-smi set -t reset -i $i -c 0
3. If the problem persists, use the msnpureport tool to collect NPU logs and contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若故障没有恢复，则建议复位SOC；
2. 若恢复则建议AI任务退出重新执行；
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (due to insufficient permission or resources), exits abnormally (due to insufficient resources), or fails to respond (due to insufficient resources).
suggestion_en: 1. If the fault persists, reset the SoC.
2. If the AI task is recovered, exit the AI task and execute it again.

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若没有恢复则建议空闲复位SOC；
2. 若恢复则无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (due to insufficient permission or resources), exits abnormally (due to insufficient resources), or fails to respond (due to insufficient resources).
suggestion_en: 1. If the fault persists, reset the SoC in idle mode.
2. If the fault is rectified, no operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若没有恢复则建议空闲复位SOC；
2. 若恢复则无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (due to insufficient permission or resources), exits abnormally (due to insufficient resources), or fails to respond (due to insufficient resources).
suggestion_en: 1. If the fault persists, reset the SoC in idle mode.
2. If the fault is rectified, no operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若没有恢复则建议空闲复位SOC；
2. 若恢复则无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (due to insufficient permission or resources), exits abnormally (due to insufficient resources), or fails to respond (due to insufficient resources).
suggestion_en: 1. If the fault persists, reset the SoC in idle mode.
2. If the fault is rectified, no operation is required.

attribute.cause_zh: tsdaemon释放hccp业务进程关键资源失败
attribute.description_zh: hccp业务进程状态异常，无法强制退出。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议立即复位SOC；
attribute.cause_en: tsdaemon failed to release key resources of the hccp service process
attribute.description_en: The hccp service process is abnormal and cannot be forcibly exited.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SoC immediately.

attribute.cause_zh: tsdaemon释放queue_scheduler业务进程普通资源失败
attribute.description_zh: queue_scheduler业务进程状态异常，无法强制退出。
suggestion_zh: 1. 空闲复位SOC，调度器无需处理；
attribute.cause_en: tsdaemon failed to release common resources of the queue_scheduler service process
attribute.description_en: The queue_scheduler service process is abnormal and cannot be forcibly exited.
suggestion_en: 1. The SOC is reset in idle mode. The scheduler does not need to process the SOC.

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (due to insufficient permission or resources), exits abnormally (due to insufficient resources), or fails to respond (due to insufficient resources).
suggestion_en: 1. No operation required;

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若没有恢复则建议空闲复位SOC，若恢复则无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (due to insufficient permission or resources), exits abnormally (due to insufficient resources), or fails to respond (due to insufficient resources).
suggestion_en: 1. If the fault persists, reset the SoC in idle mode. If the fault persists, no operation is required.

attribute.cause_zh: tsdaemon释放aicpu_cust_sd业务进程普通资源失败
attribute.description_zh: aicpu_cust_sd业务进程状态异常，无法强制退出。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议空闲复位SOC。；
attribute.cause_en: tsdaemon failed to release common resources of the aicpu_cust_sd service process
attribute.description_en: The aicpu_cust_sd service process is abnormal and cannot be forcibly exited.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SOC in idle mode.;

attribute.cause_zh: tsdaemon释放aicpu_scheduler业务进程普通资源失败
attribute.description_zh: aicpu_scheduler业务进程状态异常，无法强制退出。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议空闲复位SOC；
attribute.cause_en: tsdaemon failed to release common resources of the aicpu_scheduler service process
attribute.description_en: The aicpu_scheduler service process is abnormal and cannot be forcibly exited.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SOC in idle mode.

attribute.description_zh: AIC Dispatch多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: AIC dispatch multi-bit ECC error
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: AIC Dispatch输入错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: AIC dispatch input error
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: DSA Dispatch多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: DSA dispatch multi-bit ECC error
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: DSA Dispatch输入错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: DSA dispatch input error
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: HSM密码算法模块硬件Memery硬失效出现多bit ECC错误、读写总线错误等。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: A hardware memory hard error occurs on the HSM cryptographic algorithm module, causing multi-bit ECC errors and read/write bus errors.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: HSM密钥管理模块硬件Memery硬失效出现多bit ECC错误、读写总线错误等。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: A hardware memory hard error occurs on the HSM key management module, causing multi-bit ECC errors and read/write bus errors.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: HWTS模块内部内存多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors occur in the internal memory of the HWTS module.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: 软件给HWTS分配资源冲突，比如将同一个AIC/AIV同时分配到多个POOL里面了。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: Incorrect internal software configuration of HWTS
attribute.description_en: Conflicts occur when allocating resources to HWTS. For example, the same AIC or AIV is allocated to multiple pools.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: HWTS的访问操作地址错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Incorrect access operation address of HWTS
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: L3T片内SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors occur in the L3T on-chip SRAM.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: SOC Tsensor模块异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: Tsensor module error detected by the LPM
attribute.description_en: The SoC Tsensor module is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.cause_zh: LPM 检测到调压功能异常
attribute.description_zh: 电源模块异常，导致调频调压异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议检测电源，进行电源检修；
2. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: Voltage adjustment function exception detected by the LPM
attribute.description_en: The power module is abnormal, resulting in frequency and voltage adjustment exceptions.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to check the power supply and repair the power supply.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return to the factory for repair.

attribute.cause_zh: LPM 检测到调频功能异常
attribute.description_zh: 调频功能未使能。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: Frequency adjustment function exception detected by the LPM
attribute.description_en: The frequency adjustment function is disabled.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SoC. If the fault persists, it is recommended to send the return to the factory for repair.

attribute.cause_zh: LPM 检测到芯片电流检测功能异常
attribute.description_zh: a.电流探头访问异常；b.电源上报异常；c.软件配置错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: Chip current detection error detected by the LPM
attribute.description_en: a. The current probe access is abnormal. b. The power supply is abnormal. c. The software configuration is incorrect.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: a.低功耗业务初始化失败；b.BIOS加载LPFW镜像失败；c.运行业务出现LP子系统panic或者挂死；d.IPC通道阻塞。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: a. The low-power service fails to be initialized. b. The BIOS fails to load the LPFW image. c. The LP subsystem panic or suspension occurs when services are running. d. The IPC channel is blocked.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: a.LPM SRAM memory软失效； b.LPM 子系统CPU RAM出现多bit错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: a. Soft failure of the LPM SRAM memory. b. Multi-bit error in the CPU RAM of the LPM subsystem.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SoC. If the fault persists, it is recommended to send the return to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: EDP参数不合理或者降电流手段使用完仍控制不住电流。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The EDP parameters are improperly set or the current cannot be controlled after the current reduction method is used.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SoC. If the fault persists, it is recommended to send the return to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: pmbus硬件通路损坏或mcu切走了pmbus通路。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The PMBUS hardware channel is damaged or the MCU switches to the PMBUS channel.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SoC. If the fault persists, it is recommended to send the return to the factory for repair.

attribute.cause_zh: SOC非致命高温异常告警，不包括DDR/HBM颗粒
attribute.description_zh: 系统散热异常，低功耗软件检测芯片温度超过高温告警门限。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议检查系统散热情况，加强散热，降低芯片温度；
2. 如果不能降低温度，建议重启SOC后重新检测温度，此时还不能降温，建议硬件送修；
attribute.cause_en: Non-fatal SoC high temperature alarm (excluding DDR/HBM chips)
attribute.description_en: The heat dissipation function is abnormal, and the low-power software detects that the chip temperature exceeds the high-temperature alarm threshold.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended that you check the system heat dissipation, strengthen heat dissipation, and lower the chip temperature.
2. If the temperature cannot be lowered, restart the SoC and check the temperature again. If the temperature cannot be lowered, send the hardware for repair.

attribute.description_zh: 电路电流过大，瞬态电流超过器件设置过流门限。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.cause_en: Overcurrent alarm of the main power supply
attribute.description_en: The circuit current is too high, and the transient current exceeds the overcurrent threshold set for the component.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation required;

attribute.description_zh: PCIE片内SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: PCIe on-chip SRAM multi-bit ECC error occurs.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: 对端发生异常，或者链路错误码太多，流控异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Exceptions occur on the peer end, or frequent errors occur on the link. As a result, the flow control is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: PCIE Dispatch input error。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: PCIE dispatch input error
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: PCIE Dispatch多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；

suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: 系统内存超限，分配系统内存空间给OS和基础进程使用，ProcMgr监控系统内存余量，系统free小于64M时上报故障。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
attribute.cause_en: The system memory usage exceeds the threshold
attribute.description_en: The system memory usage exceeds the threshold. The system allocates memory to the OS and basic processes, and ProcMgr monitors the remaining system memory. However, the system's free memory is smaller than 64 MB.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SoC.

in: oom space, huge page memory is exhausted

attribute.description_zh: a.设备侧系统软件停止响应；b.PCIe底层通道异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: a. The on-device system software stops responding. b. The PCIe bottom-layer channel is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: AIC内部RAM多bit ECC错误，包括：a. I-Cache/D-Cache；b. Data buffer。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行重新发起任务请求；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors in the RAM of the AIC, including: a. I-Cache/D-Cache; b. Data buffer
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and re-execute the AI task.
2. If an exception occurs during the AI task re-execution, reset the SoC. If the fault persists, return to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: APP输入错误，算子实现错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行重新发起请求；
attribute.cause_en: AIC detects an external input error
attribute.description_en: Incorrect app input and incorrect operator implementation.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended that the AI task exit and re-execute and re-initiate the request.

attribute.description_zh: 总线译码错误, 大概率软件问题，地址错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行重新发起任务请求；
attribute.description_en: Incorrect bus decoding. In most cases, the address is incorrect due to software problems.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to exit the AI task and re-execute the AI task and re-initiate the task request.

attribute.description_zh: BIU remap table错误，大概率软件配置问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
attribute.cause_en: Incorrect internal software configuration of AIC
attribute.description_en: The BIU remap table is incorrect, which is mostly caused by software configuration.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to exit the AI task and execute it again.

attribute.description_zh: icache数据与GM校验不一致。可能原因包括：a.icache数据跳变；b.GM数据被改写。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行，重新发起任务请求；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC；
3. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: The AI Core instruction data fails to be verified
attribute.description_en: The iCache data is inconsistent with the GM data. a. iCache data changes. b. GM data is modified.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and re-execute the task.
2. If the AI task fails to be executed again, reset the SoC.
3. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: 片内SRAM颗粒失效。

suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and execute it again.

attribute.description_zh: ROCE AXI总线访问异常，包括读写总线错误、软件分配的地址错误或内部逻辑出错、系统总线相关模块出现ECC错误等等。

2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC；
3. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The RoCE AXI bus access is abnormal. For example, the read/write bus is incorrect, the address allocated by the software is incorrect, the internal logic is incorrect, or the ECC error occurs in the module related to the system bus.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and execute it again.
2. If the AI task fails to be executed again, reset the SoC.
3. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: ROCE服务超时，SCC outstanding超时错误，可能是超时时间配置错误或者内部逻辑错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC；
3. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The RoCE service times out and the SCC outstanding times out. The possible cause is that the timeout interval is incorrectly configured or the internal logic is incorrect.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and execute it again.
2. If the AI task fails to be executed again, reset the SoC.
3. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: ROCE配置错误，包括SL越界错误、SGID/SMAC/CQC/MPT/SRQC/QPC资源访问错误等。

3. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: Incorrect internal software configuration of RoCE
attribute.description_en: The RoCE configuration is incorrect, including the SL out-of-bound errors and SGID/SMAC/CQC/MPT/SRQC/QPC resource access errors.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and execute it again.
2. If the AI task fails to be executed again, reset the SoC.
3. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: 软件配置问题。

attribute.description_zh: SFC模块对Flash的擦写失败，Flash硬件故障。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；

suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.

suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行重新发起任务请求；
attribute.description_en: Incorrect chip register configuration sequence or other causes
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to exit the AI task and re-execute the AI task and re-initiate the task request.

attribute.description_zh: VPC硬件模块错误、或地址访问异常、或VP口数据宽度非偶数。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行重新发起任务请求；
attribute.description_en: The VPC hardware module is incorrect, the address access is abnormal, or the data width of the VP port is not an even number.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to exit the AI task and re-execute the AI task and re-initiate the task request.

attribute.cause_zh: aicpu检测到精度敏感特征异常
attribute.description_zh: 精度敏感特征异常导致任务失败，可能原因包括：芯片硬件类+算子软件类。
suggestion_zh: 1. 故障服务器排查：
a. 首先使用Ascend DMI压测工具，精准识别到故障卡；
b. 如果压测工具没有识别到故障，建议排查用户和算子原因；
attribute.cause_en: Exception in precision-sensitive features detected by AI CPU
attribute.description_en: The task fails due to abnormal precision-sensitive features, which may be caused by chip hardware and operator software.
suggestion_en: 1. faulty server Check:
a. Use pressure test tool to accurately identify the faulty card.
b. If the pressure test tool does not identify the fault, it is advised to check the user and operator causes.

attribute.description_zh: a.SIOE异常导致SLLC接收到异常数据；b.SLLC异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: a. The SIOE is abnormal. As a result, the SLLC receives abnormal data. b. The SLLC is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: SIOE PHY软/硬失效。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: A software or hardware error occurs on the SIOE PHY.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: AO Dispatch多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: AO dispatch multi-bit ECC error
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: AO dispatch input error
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: TSCPU parity Error
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors in the SRAM of the DDRA.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: DDRC出现了错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: An error occurs in the DDRC.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.cause_zh: DDRC同上下游交互超时异常
attribute.description_zh: DDRC组件同上下游（ddr、dha等）交互发生总线超时错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: The interaction between the DDRC and upstream/downstream devices times out
attribute.description_en: A bus timeout error occurred when the DDRC component interacted with the upstream and downstream components (such as DDR and DHA).
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: 系统（各种master）访问DDR内存地址、时机不对（如访问非法物理地址，reboot中ddr初始化前提前访问内存）。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The system (various masters) accesses an incorrect DDR memory address or at an incorrect time. For example, the system accesses an invalid physical address or accesses the memory before the DDR is initialized during reboot.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: DDRC内部SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors in the SRAM of DDRC.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.cause_zh: DDRC硬件模块内部逻辑异常
attribute.description_zh: DDRC硬件模块内部逻辑异常，包括DDR失效，链路信号质量或链路出现问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: Internal logic exception of the DDRC hardware module
attribute.description_en: Internal logic exceptions occur on the DDRC hardware module, for example, DDR failures, poor link signal quality, or link faults.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.cause_zh: DDR颗粒高温异常：非致命高温异常告警
attribute.description_zh: DDR颗粒散热异常，环境温度过高。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议检查系统散热情况，加强散热，降低芯片温度；
2. 如果不能降低温度，建议重启SOC后重新检测温度，如果此时还不能降温，建议硬件送修；
attribute.cause_en: DDR chip high temperature: non-fatal high temperature
attribute.description_en: The heat dissipation of the DDR chip is abnormal, and the ambient temperature is too high.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to check the system heat dissipation, strengthen the heat dissipation, and lower the chip temperature.
2. If the temperature cannot be lowered, restart the SoC and check the temperature again. If the temperature still cannot be lowered, send the hardware for repair.

attribute.description_zh: VENC硬件编码超时，可能是软件配置错误，或是硬件故障。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
attribute.description_en: VENC hardware encoding times out due to incorrect software configuration or hardware faults.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to exit the AI task and execute it again.

attribute.description_zh: VENC硬件编码内部处理异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
attribute.description_en: An internal processing exception occurs during VENC hardware encoding.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to exit the AI task and execute it again.

attribute.description_zh: 总线访问错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
attribute.description_en: Bus access error
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to exit the AI task and execute it again.

attribute.description_zh: AIV内部RAM多bit ECC错误，包括：a.I-Cache/D-Cache；b.Data buffer。

attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors occur in the AIV RAM, including I-Cache/D-Cache errors and data buffer errors.

attribute.description_zh: a.APP输入错误；b.算子实现错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
attribute.cause_en: AIV detects an external input error
attribute.description_en: a. Incorrect APP input; b. Incorrect operator implementation
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to exit the AI task and execute it again.

attribute.description_zh: RoH多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC；
3. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: RoH multi-bit ECC error
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and execute it again.
2. If the AI task fails to be re-executed, reset the SoC.
3. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardward to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: ROH MAC模块异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC；
3. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The ROH MAC module is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and execute it again.
2. If the AI task fails to be re-executed, reset the SoC.
3. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardward to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: CPU core片内SRAM parity错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: Parity error occurs in the SRAM of the CPU core.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation required;

attribute.description_zh: CPU core片内SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
2. 若故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors occur in the on-chip SRAM of the CPU core.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SoC.
2. If the fault persists, it is recommended that return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: HDLC（HLLC）/HPCS/PA配置错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: HDLC(HLLC)/HPCS/PA configuration error.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation required;

attribute.description_zh: JPEGD总线访问错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: JPEGD bus access error
suggestion_en: 1. No operation required;

attribute.description_zh: TSCPU模块内部故障，包括单bit或多bit ecc。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若单bit ecc无需操作，若多bit ecc则建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: An internal fault occurs in the TSCPU, including single-bit or multi-bit ECC.
suggestion_en: 1. If the single-bit ECC does not need to be operated, and if the multi-bit ECC is used, reset the SoC. If the fault persists, return the hardware to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: VPC内部SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors in the SRAM of VPC.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation required;

attribute.description_zh: a.PHY_RX侧检测到CRC错误；b.PHY_RX侧flit0报文valid位丢失并触发重传。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需处理；
attribute.description_en: a. A CRC error is detected on the PHY_RX. b. The valid bit of flit0 packets on the PHY_RX is lost and retransmission is triggered.
suggestion_en: 1. No processing required;

attribute.description_zh: RoH Port lane信号异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查链路是否OK，不恢复需要更换光模块/光纤；
attribute.cause_en: Some lanes of the RoH port are faulty
attribute.description_en: The RoH port lane signal is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the link is normal. If not, replace the optical module or the optical fiber.

attribute.description_zh: HCCS Port lane信号异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查链路是否OK，不恢复需要更换单板；
attribute.cause_en: Some lanes of the HCCS port are faulty
attribute.description_en: The HCCS port lane signal is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the link is normal. If not, replace the board .

attribute.description_zh: RoCE Port lane信号异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查链路是否OK，不恢复需要更换光模块/光纤；
attribute.cause_en: Some lanes of a RoCE port are faulty
attribute.description_en: The RoCE port lane signal is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the link is normal. If not, replace the optical module or the optical fiber.

attribute.cause_zh: DDR巡检不可纠正错误中断
attribute.description_zh: 巡检DDR颗粒多bit ECC错误、DS回写后报2bit错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: Uncorrectable error interrupt during DDR inspection
attribute.description_en: DDR multi-bit ECC occurs during DDR inspection, and 2-bit errors are reported after DS writeback.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SoC. If the fault persists, it is recommended to send the return to the factory for repair.

attribute.cause_zh: 业务访问内存颗粒，触发多bit ECC错误
attribute.description_zh: 访问DDR内存空间触发的多bit ECC错误，可能原因为DDR颗粒部分失效。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.cause_en: A multi-bit ECC error is triggered when a service accesses memory chips
attribute.description_en: A multi-bit ECC error is triggered by the access to the DDR memory space, which may be caused by invalid DDR memory.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation required;

attribute.cause_zh: 设备的DDR总的多bit ECC隔离地址记录达到64个
attribute.description_zh: DDR总的多bit ECC隔离地址记录达到64个。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: The total number of multi-bit ECC isolation addresses of the DDR reaches 64
attribute.description_en: The total number of multi-bit ECC isolation addresses of the DDR reaches 64.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended that return to the factory for repair be sent for repair;

attribute.description_zh: 芯片DDR内存颗粒多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: DDR memory chip multi-bit ECC error
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC errors on the DDR memory chip.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SoC. If the fault persists, it is recommended to send the return to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: L3T软件配置错误（如访问越界、非法访问）；可能是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.cause_en: Incorrect internal software configuration of the L3T.
attribute.description_en: L3T software configuration is incorrect, such as out-of-bounds access and unauthorized access. It may be a software or hardware problem, mostly a software problem.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: 低功耗总线访问异常(包含bus error和poison)，通常由于软件分配的地址错误或内部逻辑出错、系统总线相关模块出现ECC错误导致。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI训练任务保存checkpoint，无需其他处理；
attribute.description_en: Low-power bus access exceptions (including bus errors and poison errors) occur, which are usually caused by incorrect address allocation by software, internal logic errors, or ECC errors in system bus-related modules.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to save checkpoints for AI training tasks without any other operations.

attribute.description_zh: 低功耗模块事件、数据上报异常，通常为硬件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Low-power module event and data reporting exception. Usually a hardware problem.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, return the device to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: 总线通道NOC parity 校验错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: Bus channel NOC parity error.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: 网口模块内buffer多bit ECC错误，可能导致丢包。通常是硬件异常导致。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若AI业务中断建议重执行AI任务；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC；
3. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.cause_en: Multi-bit ECC error on the network port
attribute.description_en: A multi-bit ECC error occurs in the buffer of the network port module, which may cause packet loss. This is usually caused by a hardware exception.
suggestion_en: 1. If the AI service is interrupted, it is advised to re-execute the AI task.
2. If the AI task fails to be re-executed, it is advised to reset the SOC.
3. If the fault persists, it is advised to send the device back to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh:
网口端口异常，网口功能处理异常。
 a. 软件原因：软件配置错误。
 b. 硬件原因：硬件异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若AI业务中断建议重执行AI任务；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC；
3. 如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en:
The network port is abnormal, and the network port function processing is abnormal.
 a. Software cause: The software configuration is incorrect.
 b. Hardware cause: The hardware is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. If the AI service is interrupted, it is advised to re-execute the AI task.
2. If the AI task fails to be re-executed, it is advised to reset the SOC.
3. If the fault persists, it is advised to send the device back to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: SLLC从总线收到的应答中携带错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需处理；
attribute.description_en: The SLLC received an error in the acknowledgment from the bus.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: IMP硬件故障、IMP固件故障。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议联系华为工程师；
attribute.description_en: IMP hardware failure, IMP firmware failure.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh: UB配置错误，包括权限表配置、资源访问地址错误等。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议联系华为工程师；
attribute.description_en: UB configuration errors, including permission table configuration errors and incorrect resource access addresses.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh: UB总线访问异常，通常由于软件分配的地址错误或内部逻辑出错、系统总线相关模块出现ECC错误导致。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI训练任务退出重新执行；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议联系华为工程师；
attribute.description_en: An UB bus access exception occurs, which is usually caused by incorrect address allocated by the software, internal logic error, or ECC error in the system bus module.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to exit the AI training task and execute it again.
2. If the AI training task fails to be executed again, it is recommended to reset the SoC. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh: UB模块逻辑处理异常，通常由于软件配置或内外部硬件错误导致。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议联系华为工程师；
attribute.description_en: The logic processing of the UB module is abnormal, which is usually caused by software configuration or internal or external hardware errors.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh: UB模块内SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: SRAM multi-bit ECC error in the UB module.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, return the device to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh:
a. UB_PORT口芯片检测到自身link状态故障
 b. UB_PORT口芯片检测到对端link状态故障。
suggestion_zh: 1. 排查外部链路是否出错；
2. 建议复位对应的UB端口，如果故障持续建议联系华为工程师；
attribute.cause_en: The UB_PORT link status changes from Up to Down.
attribute.description_en:
a. The chip of the UB_PORT detects a link fault.
 b. The chip of the UB_PORT detects a link fault on the peer end.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the external link is faulty.
2. It is advised to reset the corresponding UB port. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh: UB_PORT模块逻辑处理异常，通常由于软件配置或内外部硬件错误导致。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位故障端口，如果故障持续建议联系华为工程师；
attribute.description_en: The logic processing of the UB_PORT module is abnormal, which is usually caused by software configuration or internal or external hardware errors.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the faulty port. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh: UB_PORT模块内SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位故障端口，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: Multi-bit ECC error in the SRAM of the UB_PORT module.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the faulty port. If the fault persists, return the device to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: VPC硬件复位失败，可能是软件或硬件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
attribute.description_en: The VPC hardware reset failed, which may be due to a software or hardware issue.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SOC.

attribute.description_zh: VPC单Bit ECC错误不可纠错；通常是硬件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.cause_en: Uncorrectable single-bit ECC error on the VPC.
attribute.description_en: VPC single-bit ECC errors cannot be corrected. It's usually a hardware problem.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: 进程拉起失败（权限不足、资源不足等）、异常退出（资源不足等）或无法响应（资源不足等）；通常是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The process fails to be started (for example, insufficient permissions or resources), exits abnormally (for example, insufficient resources), or cannot respond (for example, insufficient resources). It's usually a software problem.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: UB AA 总线错误(包含bus error、parity)。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: UB AA bus error (including bus error and parity error).
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: IO AA 总线错误(包含bus error、parity)。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: I/O AA bus error (including bus error and parity error).
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: PERI AA 总线错误(包含bus error、parity)。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: PERI AA bus error (including bus error and parity error).
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: AIC AA 总线错误(包含bus error、parity)。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: AIC AA bus error (including bus error and parity error).
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: STARS AA 总线错误(包含bus error、parity)。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: STARS AA bus error (including bus error and parity error).
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: DVPP AA 总线错误(包含bus error、parity)。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: DVPP AA bus error (including bus error and parity error).
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: AIC任务运行超时，通常是算子实现问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI训练任务退出重新执行，重新发起推理请求；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: The AIC task times out, this is usually due to an operator implementation issue.
suggestion_en: 1. Suggest exiting the AI training task and executing it again, initiate a new inference request.
2. If the AI task fails to be re-executed, it is advised to reset the SoC. If the fault persists, return the device to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: AIV Timeout，通常是算子实现问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI训练任务退出重新执行，重新发起推理请求；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: AIV Timeout, operator implementation is usually a problem.
suggestion_en: 1. Suggest exiting the AI training task and executing it again, initiate a new inference request.
2. If the AI task fails to be re-executed, it is advised to reset the SoC. If the fault persists, return the device to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: CCU写总线错误或者总线响应超时，导致CCU模块异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议联系华为工程师；
attribute.description_en: A write bus error or bus response timeout occurs on the CCU, causing an exception on the CCU.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 由于其它模块错误导致访问通路中出现不可纠正的错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议AI任务退出重新执行；
2. 若AI任务重新执行异常则建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议联系华为工程师；
attribute.description_en: An uncorrectable error occurs in the access path due to an error in another module.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to exit the AI task and execute it again.
2. If the AI task fails to be executed again, you are advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh: CCU配置错误，包括安全属性配置、资源访问配置等。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议联系华为工程师；
attribute.cause_en: Incorrect internal software configuration of the CCU.
attribute.description_en: Incorrect CCU configurations, including security attribute configurations and resource access configurations.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh: CCU片内SRAM多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: CCU on-chip SRAM multi-bit ECC error.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, return the device to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: UB Dispatch输入错误，通常是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议联系华为工程师；
attribute.description_en: UB Dispatch input error, this is usually a software or hardware issue, mostly a software problem.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh: UB Dispatch配置错误；可能是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The UB Dispatch configuration is incorrect. This may be caused by software or hardware issues, but most of the time, it is a software issue.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: IO Dispatch配置错误；可能是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The I/O dispatch configuration is incorrect. It may be a software or hardware problem, mostly a software problem.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: IO Dispatch input error；通常是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: IO Dispatch input error; Usually software or hardware problems, mostly software problems.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, return the device to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: PERI Dispatch配置错误；可能是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The PERI Dispatch configuration is incorrect. It may be a software or hardware problem, mostly a software problem.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: TS Dispatch配置错误；可能是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The TS Dispatch configuration is incorrect. It may be a software or hardware problem, mostly a software problem.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: AIC Dispatch配置错误；可能是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The AIC Dispatch is incorrectly configured. It may be a software or hardware problem, mostly a software problem.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: DVPP Dispatch输入错误；可能是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: The value of Dispatch in the DVPP is incorrect. It may be a software or hardware problem, mostly software problems.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: HBM UCE上报故障达到风暴屏蔽门限，则进行UCE故障屏蔽，待3分钟后主动解屏蔽；通常是硬件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC。
attribute.description_en: If the fault reported by the HBM UCE reaches the storm shielding threshold, the HBM UCE masks the UCE fault and unblocks the UCE fault after 3 minutes. It's usually a hardware problem.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SOC.

attribute.description_zh: HBMA配置错误，包括接收非法操作、跨安全域访问、MSD的invert/overlap/miss错误等；可能是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.cause_en: Incorrect internal software configuration of the HBMA.
attribute.description_en: HBMA configurations are incorrect, including receiving invalid operations, cross-security domain access, and MSD invert/overlap/miss errors. It may be a software or hardware problem, mostly a software problem.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: 其他模块给HA模块发送的数据有异常(包含bus error、parity)。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.description_en: Data sent from other modules to the HA module is abnormal (including bus error and parity error).
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: 运行业务出现HISS子系统panic或挂死；可能是软件或硬件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
attribute.description_en: The HISS subsystem panics or suspends during service running. It may be a software or hardware problem.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SOC.

attribute.description_zh: HISS子系统片内SRAM出现多bit ECC错误。HISS子系统片内bootrom出现多bit ECC错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
attribute.description_en: A multi-bit ECC error occurs in the on-chip SRAM of the HISS subsystem. A multi-bit ECC error occurs in the on-chip bootrom of the HISS subsystem.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, return the device to the factory for repair.

attribute.cause_zh: HSM子系统遭受物理攻击错误
attribute.description_zh:
HISS子系统被实施真实故障注入攻击：（通常是硬件问题）
 a. HISS子系统内SUBCTRL寄存器因故障注入出现parity错误；
 b. HISS子系统被实施真实故障注入攻击导致efuse操作异常；
 c. HISS子系统内部总线被实施真实故障注入攻击；
 d. HISS子系统内部SRAM被实施真实故障注入攻击。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续建议返厂送修；
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, return the device to the factory for repair.

attribute.description_zh: STARS上报消息的通道异常，例如WQE发送失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC，如果故障持续需要联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The channel through which STARS reports messages is abnormal, for example, WQE sending fails.
suggestion_en: 1. It is advised to reset the SOC. If the fault persists, contact Huawei technical support.

attribute.description_zh:
a. IMU业务初始化失败；
 b. BIOS加载IMU镜像失败；
 c. 运行业务出现IMU子系统panic或者挂死；
 d. IPC通道阻塞；可能是软件或硬件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 不处理（IMU有看门狗检测后自复位机制；IMU是管理面，不影响业务）；
attribute.cause_en: Abnormal heartbeat detection of the IMU subsystem
attribute.description_en:
a. The IMU service fails to be initialized.
 b. The BIOS fails to load the IMU image.
 c. The IMU subsystem panics or suspends when services are running.
 d. The IPC channel is blocked. This may be a software or hardware problem.
suggestion_en: 1. Not handled (The IMU automatically resets after the watchdog detects the fault. The IMU is a management plane and does not affect services).

attribute.description_zh: JPEGD硬件复位失败，可能是软件或硬件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
attribute.description_en: The JPEGD hardware reset fails, which may be caused by software or hardware issues.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SOC.

attribute.description_zh: JPEGE硬件复位失败，可能是软件或硬件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议复位SOC；
attribute.description_en: The JPEGE hardware reset fails, which may be caused by software or hardware issues.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to reset the SOC.

attribute.description_zh: 平台软件配置非预期错误，或硬件失效等导致地址非法；可能是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.cause_en: Incorrect internal software configuration of the L2BUFF.
attribute.description_en: The platform software configuration is incorrect, or the hardware fails, causing the address to be invalid. It may be a software or hardware problem, mostly a software problem.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: L3D软件配置错误（如访问越界、非法访问）；可能是软件或硬件问题，大多是软件问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 无需操作；
attribute.cause_en: Incorrect internal software configuration of the L3D
attribute.description_en: L3D software configuration is incorrect, such as out-of-bounds access and unauthorized access. It may be a software or hardware problem, mostly a software problem.
suggestion_en: 1. No operation is required.

attribute.description_zh: CANN包安装不完整。
suggestion_zh: 1. CANN包安装不完整，检查对应包是否缺失和环境变量设置是否正确；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to verify the CANN package integrity
attribute.description_en: The CANN package is not completely installed.
suggestion_en: 1. The install of the CANN package is incomplete. Check whether the corresponding package is missing and whether the environment variable is set correctly.

attribute.description_zh: CANN环境变量缺失，或者部分缺失。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查对应环境变量是否配置，并在CANN的安装路径执行source set_env.sh；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to verify the environment variables of the CANN package
attribute.description_en: The CANN environment variables are missing or partially missing.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the corresponding environment variable is configured and run the command "source set_env.sh" in the install directory of the CANN.

in: Please check that the cann package is installed

attribute.description_zh: 无效参数，非可解析参数。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据提示信息，修改torch.distributed.launch的入参；
attribute.description_en: The parameter is invalid and cannot be parsed.
suggestion_en: 1. Modify the input parameter of torch.distributed.launch as prompted.

attribute.description_zh: 无效参数，非可解析参数。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据提示信息，修改torchrun的入参；
attribute.description_en: The parameter is invalid and cannot be parsed.
suggestion_en: 1. Modify the torchrun input parameter as prompted.

attribute.cause_zh: 设备已经被其他进程占用

attribute.description_en: The NPU fails to be initialized in distributed mode, and the HCCP process cannot be initialized.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the environment is occupied by others or whether there are residual processes.

in: the last training process is running

attribute.description_zh: 入参的类型或值错误。

attribute.description_en: The type or value of the input parameter is incorrect.

attribute.description_zh: 传入的device参数无效或者超范围。

attribute.cause_en: An incorrect input parameter is passed when torch.npu.set_device is called
attribute.description_en: The input parameter is invalid or out of range.

in: Check whether the device ID is valid

suggestion_zh: 1. 收集日志信息，定位故障原因；
attribute.description_en: An error is reported when the aclrtSetDevice API is called.
suggestion_en: 1. Collect log information and locate cause of malfunction .

attribute.description_zh: 传参错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据提示信息，修改torch.distributed.init_process_group的入参或者配置环境变量；
attribute.cause_en: An incorrect input parameter is passed when torch.distributed.init_process_group is called
attribute.description_en: Incorrect input parameter
suggestion_en: 1. Modify the input parameter of torch.distributed.init_process_group or set environment variable as prompted.

attribute.description_zh: 重复初始化进程组。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请勿重复调用torch.distributed.init_process_group初始化进程组；
attribute.cause_en: A process group is repeatedly initialized when torch.distributed.init_process_group is called
attribute.description_en: A process group is initialized repeatedly.
suggestion_en: 1. Do not repeatedly invoke torch.distributed.init_process_group to initialize the process group.

in: RuntimeError: trying to initialize the default process group twice!

attribute.description_zh: 端口已被占用。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查torch.distributed.init_process_group传入的端口是否已经被占用；
attribute.cause_en: The port for calling torch.distributed.init_process_group is occupied
attribute.description_en: Ports Are Occupied
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the port transferred by torch.distributed.init_process_group is occupied.

attribute.description_zh: 传参错误。

attribute.description_en: Incorrect input parameter
suggestion_en: 1. Modify the input parameter torch.utils.checkpoint as prompted.

in: loaded state dict has a different number of parameter groups

attribute.description_zh: 传入文件路径错误或者文件格式非法或权限不足。

in: RuntimeError: Invalid usage of tensors with different dtypesFound

in: RuntimeError: Tensor list input to scatter/gather must match number of collective participants
