attribute.description_zh: 未正常部署驱动。
suggestion_zh: 1. 调用npu-smi检测驱动是否正常安装；
2. 若未正常安装，则按照用户手册安装驱动；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to call the DCMI API
attribute.description_en: The driver is not properly deployed.
suggestion_en: 1. Invoke npu-smi to check whether the driver is normal install;
2. If the driver is not properly installed, install the driver according to the user manual.

attribute.description_zh: kubelet.sock未正常映射到容器的/var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins/路径下。
suggestion_zh: 1. 进入device-plugin容器，查看/var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins目录下是否有kubelet.sock文件；
2. 若没有kubelet.sock文件，检查device-plugin的部署yaml，检查volumes和volumeMounts中device-plugin是否配置正确；
attribute.description_en: kubelet.sock is not mapped to the /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins/ directory of the container.
suggestion_en: 1. Go to the device-plugin container and check whether the kubelet.sock file exists in the /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins directory.
2. If the kubelet.sock file does not exist, check the device-plugin deployment yaml file and check whether the device-plugin configuration in volumes and volumeMounts is correct.

in: check kubelet socket file path failed

attribute.description_zh: 未配置容器的角色权限。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看device-plugin的部署yaml，检查ClusterRole和ClusterRoleBinding是否配置正确；
2. 若未正确配置，参考device-plugin安装包中device-plugin-volcano-v{version}.yaml中的配置进行配置；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to connect to the K8s APIServer
attribute.description_en: The role permission of the container is not configured.
suggestion_en: 1. View the device-plugin deployment yaml file and check whether ClusterRole and ClusterRoleBinding are correctly configured.
2. If the configuration is incorrect, refer to the configuration in device-plugin-volcano-v{version}.yaml in the device-plugin install package.

attribute.description_zh: 驱动版本过低、推理场景或加载故障配置文件失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请尝试更新最新的驱动版本解决；
attribute.description_en: The driver version is too early, the inference scenario is used, or the fault configuration file fails to be loaded.
suggestion_en: 1. Update the latest driver version .

attribute.description_zh: dp rc3版本后，dp的容器账户新增pod缺少watch权限，则会丢失pod删除消息。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看device-plugin的部署yaml，检查ClusterRole和ClusterRoleBinding是否配置正确；
2. 参考rc3版本之后的device-plugin安装包中device-plugin-volcano-v{version}.yaml中的配置进行正确配置；
attribute.cause_en: Pod informer update and delete messages are lost
attribute.description_en: After the dp rc3 version, the dp container account lacks the watch permission for new pods, which will result in the loss of pod deletion messages.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the deployment YAML of device-plugin to verify that ClusterRole and ClusterRoleBinding are configured correctly.
2. Configure correctly according to the settings in the device-plugin-volcano-v{version}.yaml file in the device-plugin installation package after version rc3.

attribute.description_zh: 宿主机上有多个kubelet.sock，未使用最新的。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查device-plugin的部署yaml，查看volumes中定义的device-plugin的hostPath路径；
2. 在hostPath路径中查看是否存在多个kubelet.sock文件；
3. 若存在多个kubelet.sock文件，保留最新的kubelet.sock；
attribute.description_en: Multiple kubelet.sock files exist on the host, and the latest one is not used.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the device-plugin deployment yaml file and the hostPath path of the device-plugin defined in volumes.
2. Check whether multiple kubelet.sock files exist in hostPath.
3. If multiple kubelet.sock files exist, retain the latest kubelet.sock file.

attribute.cause_zh: pod无法正确挂载NPU相关驱动文件
attribute.description_zh: Device-plugin没有自动识别docker-runtime，需要安装配套版本的docker-runtime之后，再重启一下Device-plugin。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看文件/etc/docker/daemon.json，确认runtimes是否已经写成了；
"ascend": {
"path": "/usr/local/Ascend/Ascend-Docker-Runtime/ascend-docker-runtime",
"runtimeArgs": []
2. 如果没有，则根据用户手册安装ascend docker runtime；
attribute.cause_en: NPU-related driver files cannot be correctly mounted to pods
attribute.description_en: Device Plugin does not automatically identify Docker Runtime. The docker-runtime of the matching version should be installed and the Device Plugin restarted.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the /etc/docker/daemon.json file and check whether runtimes is written.
2. If no, follow the instructions in the user manual install docker runtime.

attribute.description_zh: 未正常配置volcano容器的角色权限。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看volcano部署的yaml中ClusterRole，参考5.0.RC3版本之后的volcano下发yaml进行配置；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to connect to the Kubernetes APIServer
attribute.description_en: Role permissions for the Volcano container are not properly configured.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the ClusterRole in the YAML file deployed by Volcano. Configure it according to the YAML file issued by Volcano after version 5.0.RC3.

attribute.description_zh: volcano rc3版本后，volcano的容器账户新增configmap的list缺少watch权限，则会下任务失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看volcano部署的yaml中ClusterRole，参考5.0.RC3版本之后的volcano下发yaml进行配置；
attribute.cause_en: ConfigMap informer update and delete messages are lost
attribute.description_en: After the Volcano RC3 version, the container account of Volcano lacks the watch permission for listing ConfigMaps, which will cause task submission to fail.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the ClusterRole in the YAML file deployed by Volcano. Configure it according to the YAML file issued by Volcano after version 5.0.RC3.

attribute.description_zh: volcano镜像中的插件so名字和下发volcano时使用的yaml名称不相同。
suggestion_zh: 1. 修改volcano下发yaml中的插件名称与镜像中名称统一，重新下发volcano；
attribute.description_en: The .so file name of the plugin in the Volcano image is different from the YAML file name used for delivering the Volcano image.
suggestion_en: 1. Change the plug-in name in the yaml file delivered by the Volcano to be the same as the name in the image, and then deliver the Volcano again.

attribute.cause_zh: 任务调度失败，无法出现pod
attribute.description_zh: 节点无法部署新的NPU任务，下发任务pg状态inqueue没有出现pod。
suggestion_zh: 1. 尝试根据controller的报错调整yaml中的字段内容；
attribute.cause_en: Task scheduling fails, and pods cannot be displayed
attribute.description_en: New NPU tasks cannot be deployed on the node, and no pod is displayed in inqueue with pg status.
suggestion_en: 1. Adjust the field content in the yaml file based on the controller error.

attribute.description_zh: runc的属主为非root，或者权限为777之类的高权限，应该为755或750。
suggestion_zh: 1. 进入/usr/bin，检查runc的权限不应该包含可写；
attribute.cause_en: The container or pod cannot be started
attribute.description_en: The runc owner is not root, or the permission is 777. The permission should be 755 or 750.
suggestion_en: 1. Go to /usr/bin and check that the permission of runc does not contain writable.

attribute.description_zh: libdcmi.so文件或其所在目录的权限不正确，需要确保libdcmi.so文件的属主为root或者当前运行用户，并且group和other不能有写权限，同时需要保证其祖先文件夹拥有同样的权限设置。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查/usr/local/Ascend/driver/lib64/driver/libdcmi.so 和/usr/local/dcmi/libdcmi.so文件的及其父文件夹的权限，确保当前用户没有写权限；
attribute.description_en: The permission on the libdcmi.so file or the directory where the file is located is incorrect. Ensure that the owner of the libdcmi.so file is the root user or the current running user, the group and other users do not have the write permission, and the ancestor folders have the same permission.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the permissions of the related .so files and their parent folder. Ensure that the current user does not have the write permission.

attribute.description_zh: container模式设置错误，导致NPU-Exporter尝试连接错误的sock文件。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查npu-exporter的配置参数，是docker还是containerd；
2. 检查k8s的容器启动方式，是否与npu-exporter一致；
attribute.cause_en: The CRI client fails to be initialized
attribute.description_en: The container mode is incorrectly set. As a result, NPU Exporter attempts to connect to an incorrect sock file.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the configuration parameter of npu-exporter is docker or containerd.
2. Check the container startup mode of the Kubernetes is the same as that of the npu-exporter.

attribute.description_zh: hccn_tool工具异常或工具路径为软链接。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查/usr/local/Ascend/driver/tools/hccn_tool文件是否存在；
attribute.description_en: hccn_tool is abnormal or the tool path is a soft link.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the hccn_tool file exists;

attribute.description_zh: Device故障。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系技术人员支持；
attribute.cause_en: Card, memory, CPU, and other component failures
attribute.description_en: The device is faulty.
suggestion_en: 1. Please contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 存储故障。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系技术人员支持；
attribute.description_en: storage fault.
suggestion_en: 1. Please contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 等待时间超过设定的时延。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查服务器是否正在运行；
2. 查看CPU、内存使用率是否异常；
3. 确认是否有大量请求积压；
attribute.description_en: The waiting time exceeds the specified delay.
suggestion_en: 1. Check if the server is running.
2. Check whether the CPU and memory usage are abnormal.
3. Confirm whether there is a large backlog of requests.

attribute.description_zh: 设置上下文校验模式时出现错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: An error occurred when the context verification mode is set.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 通信链路中断。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The communication link is interrupted.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: Httpserver连接数达到设定的上限。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查当前请求是否拥塞，在user_config_base.json文件中尝试调大最大连接数maxLinkNum；
2. 等待请求释放；
attribute.description_en: The number of Httpserver connections reaches the upper limit.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the current request is congested, try increasing the maximum number of connections in the user_config_base.json file.
2. Waiting for request release.

attribute.description_zh: Httpserver初始化时申请内存失败，一般是创建会话或监听器失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to allocate memory during Httpserver initialization
attribute.description_en: The memory fails to be allocated during Httpserver initialization. Generally, the cause is that the session or listener fails to be created.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: Httpserver内证书/密钥文件缺失。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The certificate or key file of Httpserver is missing.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: Httpserver内添加密钥不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The key added to Httpserver is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 资源（节点、请求等）未查询到。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Controller cannot find the requested resource
attribute.description_en: No resource (node or request) is found.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: Controller组件内出现申请内存失败，可能是系统资源不足导致的创建对象或是线程失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Controller fails to allocate memory. The possible cause is that the system resources are insufficient. As a result, objects or threads fail to be created.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 上层调用失败引发的故障日志，具体故障原因参考附近下层日志。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Fault logs are generated due to upper-layer calling failure. For details about the fault causes, see the logs of the lower layer.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 节点被重复继承或url handler被重复注册。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The node is repeatedly inherited or the URL handler is repeatedly registered.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 输入的配置文件中某些配置项不存在或不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Some configuration items in the configuration file do not exist or are invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 疑似Controller处理Json和String转换时捕获的异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Error occurred when Controller captures exceptions
attribute.description_en: It is suspected that an exception is captured when Controller processes the conversion between JSON and String.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 返回的response校验失败或是一些空值异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The returned response fails to be verified or some empty values are abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 节点状态不可用或方法/硬件类型不支持。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The node status is unavailable or the method or hardware type is not supported.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 节点数量或分组数量超过了设定的上限。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The number of nodes or groups exceeds the upper limit.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: Controller组件内发送Http请求失败，可能是连接中断或请求体不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查网络链路是否畅通；
2. 执行对端P/D实例curl http://{ip}:{port}/v2/health/ready命令看是否正常返回200；
attribute.description_en: Controller fails to send an HTTP request. The possible cause is that the connection is interrupted or the request body is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Check if the network link is functioning properly.
2. Run the curl http://{ip}:{port}/v2/health/ready command on the peer P/D instance to check whether it returns 200 normally.

attribute.description_zh: Coordinator上层调用失败引发的故障日志，具体故障原因参考附近下层日志。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Fault logs are generated due to upper-layer calling failure. For details about the fault causes, see the logs of the lower layer.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: Coordinator输入的配置文件中某些配置项不存在或不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Some configuration items in the Coordinator configuration file do not exist or are invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 疑似初始化处理json时的异常、集群实例异常或请求异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Error occurred when Coordinator captures exceptions
attribute.description_en: The exception may be JSON initialization exception, cluster instance exception, or request exception.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 集群管理重复添加实例id/请求id。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The instance ID or request ID is repeatedly added during cluster management.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 节点/连接/请求等资源未查询到。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Coordinator cannot find the requested resource
attribute.description_en: Resources such as nodes, connections, and requests are not found.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: Http请求体不合法或通信失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查请求合法性，尝试重新执行请求；
2. 重启推理服务；
attribute.description_en: The HTTP request body is invalid or the communication fails.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the validity of the request and attempt to re-execute it.
2. Restart the reasoning service.

attribute.description_zh: HttpClientAsync连接上限或是请求重试次数上限。
suggestion_zh: 1. 集群流量有过载风险，尝试分流到其它集群；
attribute.description_en: The number of HttpClientAsync connections or request retries reaches the upper limit.
suggestion_en: 1. The cluster traffic is at risk of overload; attempt to distribute it to other clusters.

attribute.description_zh: 初始时设置Tls上下文失败/从mindie-server读取计算token的结果失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The TLS context fails to be set during initialization, or the token calculation result fails to be read from the MindIE Server.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 异步处理还未结束，DoWriteFinishRes和DoWriteChunk同时到来。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The asynchronous processing is not complete, and DoWriteFinishRes and DoWriteChunk arrive at the same time.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 当前配置不可用/节点连接失败/当前节点不可用/无可用节点。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The current configuration is unavailable, the node fails to be connected, the current node is unavailable, or no node is available.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 请求调度/推理/首token/tokenizer。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Request scheduling/inference/first token/tokenizer times out.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: Deployer输入的配置文件中某些配置项不存在或不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Some configuration items in the Deployer configuration file do not exist or are invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 当前不支持的硬件类型/部署参数设置。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The hardware type or deployment parameter settings are not supported.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 实例数量超过数量上限。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The number of instances exceeds the upper limit.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 发送k8s请求失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Failed to send the Kubernetes request.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 上层调用失败引发的故障日志，具体故障原因参考附近下层日志。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Fault logs are generated due to upper-layer calling failure. For details about the fault causes, see the logs of the lower layer.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: k8s响应参数校验失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Failed to verify the Kubernetes response parameters.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: Deployer内配置文件缺失。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The Deployer configuration file is missing.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 创建线程实例时失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Failed to create the thread instance.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 推理服务创造器/推理服务被重复插入/创建。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The inference service creator or inference service is repeatedly inserted or created.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 初始化配置时字符串处理异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Error occurred when Controller captures exceptions
attribute.description_en: An exception occurs in character string processing during configuration initialization.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 配置参数不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to verify the BackendConfig configuration parameter
attribute.description_en: The parameter is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: LLMInferEngine初始化失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: LLMInferEngine initialization failed.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型配置参数（ModelDeployConfig）校验失败
attribute.description_zh: 配置参数不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The parameter is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 底层模型或调度引擎初始化失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Failed to initialize the underlying model.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 初始化失败：插件特性不支持
attribute.description_zh: 插件类型名称配置不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Initialization failure: plugin feature not supported
attribute.description_en: The plugin type name is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 初始化失败：特性使用场景限制条件不满足
attribute.description_zh: 使能插件与不支持的特性配合。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Initialization failure: requirements on feature usage not met
attribute.description_en: Enable the plugin to work with unsupported features.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 运行时报错：使用了未申请过的requset id。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Running error: A request ID that has not been applied for is used.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 请求推理失败：采样参数非法
attribute.description_zh: 除零异常报错：采样后处理temperature采样参数配置为0。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Inference request failure: invalid sampling parameter
attribute.description_en: Division by zero error: The temperature sampling parameter is set to 0 during sampling postprocessing.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 请求推理失败：采样参数非法
attribute.description_zh: 除零异常报错：采样后处理重复惩罚参数配置为0。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Inference request failure: invalid sampling parameter
attribute.description_en: Division by zero error: The repeated penalty parameter is set to 0 during sample postprocessing.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 请求推理失败：没有正常执行推理流程
attribute.description_zh: 除零异常报错：并行解码推理执行轮数为0。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Inference request failure: inference process not properly executed
attribute.description_en: Division by zero error: The number of epochs of parallel decoding inference is 0.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 请求推理失败：没有正常执行推理流程
attribute.description_zh: 除零异常报错：并行解码推理执行时间为0。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Inference request failure: inference process not properly executed
attribute.description_en: Division by zero error: The execution time of parallel decoding inference is 0.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 运行时报错：信息统计时出现未使用过的req_id。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Running error: An unused request ID is found during information collection.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 初始化失败：generator_backend类型不支持
attribute.description_zh: 配置了未支持的generator_backend类型。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Initialization failure: generator_backend type not supported
attribute.description_en: The generator_backend type is not supported.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 请求推理失败：校验request_ids的shape失败
attribute.description_zh: 上层调用sampler时传入的request_ids与logits的第0维shape不一致。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Inference request failure: shape of request_ids failed to be verified
attribute.description_en: When the upper layer calls sampler, the input request_ids is inconsistent with the shape of dimension 0 of logits.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 请求推理失败：decode阶段找不到参数缓存
attribute.description_zh: 上层应用未发送prefill请求或在请求已判停后继续发送decode请求。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Inference request failure: no parameter cache in the decode phase
attribute.description_en: The upper-layer application does not send a prefill request or continues to send a decode request after the request is stopped.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 请求推理失败：block_size校验失败
attribute.description_zh: 构造input_metadata输入时传入了非法的max_block_size。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Inference request failure: block_size verification failed
attribute.description_en: An invalid value of max_block_size is passed when input_metadata is constructed.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 配置的eos_token_id参数格式既不是int型也不是非空列表。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: eos_token_id is neither of the int type nor a non-null list.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: dp场景下未获取到dp_rank_ids入参。
suggestion_zh: 1. 故障日志若记录dp_rank_ids相关错误，属于内部错误，请联系技术人员支持；
attribute.description_en: In the dp scenario, the input parameter dp_rank_ids was not obtained.
suggestion_en: 1. If the fault log records errors related to dp_rank_ids, it is an internal error. Please contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 网络配置问题或者建链下发功能异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 网口down；
2. HCCS未使能；
3. 端口被其他进程占用；
4. 一端下发建链请求，另一端没有下发建链；
5. 若问题无法解决，请联系华为工程师处理。
attribute.cause_en: Failed to establish chains during PD Disaggregation
attribute.description_en: Incorrect network configuration or abnormal chain establishment and delivery functions.
suggestion_en: 1. network port down;
2. HCCS is not enabled.
3. The port is occupied by another process.
4. One end sends a link establishment request, but the other end does not send a link establishment request.
5. If the fault persists, contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 网络问题。
suggestion_zh: 1. 网络闪断；
2. 交换机和npu网口以及数据发送方优先级队列配置不匹配；
3. 交换机pfc优先队列没有开启；
4. 若问题无法解决，请联系华为工程师处理。
attribute.cause_en: Failed to pull kv during PD Disaggregation
attribute.description_en: Network issue.
suggestion_en: 1. The network is intermittently disconnected.
2. The configuration of the network port on the switch, the NPU, and the priority queue of the data sender do not match.
3. The PFC priority queue on the switch is not enabled.
4. If the fault persists, contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 初始化失败：模型参数校验失败
attribute.description_zh: 参数不在合法值范围内。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看模型config.json文件里torch_dtype字段，以及对应模型的Readme文件；
2. 若问题不能解决，请联系技术支持；
attribute.cause_en: Initialization failure: model parameters failed to be verified
attribute.description_en: The parameter value is not in the valid range.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the torch_dtype field in the model's config.json file, as well as the corresponding model's Readme file.
2. If the issue cannot be resolved, please contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 模型组图 param json校验失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. param.json校验失败，会显式打印出具体错误信息，根据日志可定位出具体错误原因；
attribute.description_en: Failed to verify the parameters in JSON format of the model graph.
suggestion_en: 1. If the param.json validation fails, specific error messages will be explicitly printed, and the exact cause of the error can be identified based on the logs.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型运行时：framework set up校验失败或者execute失败
attribute.description_zh: 加速库set up校验失败或者execute失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 在~/ascend/log目录查看加速库日志，查看昇腾社区的文档尝试定位问题；
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/83RC1/acce/ascendtb/ascendtb_0001.html
attribute.cause_en: When the model is running, the framework set up verification fails or the execution fails
attribute.description_en: Acceleration library setup verification failed or execution failed.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the acceleration library logs in the ~/ascend/log directory and refer to the documentation on the Ascend community to try to locate the issue.
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/83RC1/acce/ascendtb/ascendtb_0001.html

attribute.cause_zh: 初始化失败：模型不支持
attribute.description_zh: 模型名不在ModelFactory支持的范围内。
suggestion_zh: 1. 故障日志会记录不支持的模型，请选择支持的模型；
attribute.description_en: The model name is not within the range supported by ModelFactory.
suggestion_en: 1. The fault log will record unsupported models. Please select supported models.

attribute.cause_zh: framework execute失败或者内部错误
attribute.description_zh: 加速库infershape失败或者block tables被重复申请。
suggestion_zh: 1. 出现intensor异常问题，会打印具体算子infershape错误，请联系技术支持；
2. 故障日志会记录block分配失败的信息，若出现此问题，请联系技术支持；
attribute.cause_en: Framework execution failed or internal error
attribute.description_en: The acceleration library failed to infer shapes or block tables were repeatedly allocated.
suggestion_en: 1. If an intensor exception occurs, the specific operator infershape error will be printed. Please contact technical support.
2. The fault log will record information about block allocation failures. If this issue occurs, please contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 用户请求的input字段不是string类型。
suggestion_zh: 1. 修改请求体中的input参数为string类型；
attribute.cause_en: The request input does not pass the verification
attribute.description_en: The input field in the user request is not of the string type.
suggestion_en: 1. Modify the input parameter of the request body is the string type.

attribute.description_zh: 用户输入单个（多个）请求体量过大，超过服务化设定的共享内存大小。
suggestion_zh: 1. 确认系统分配的共享内存（/dev/shm）大小是否满足请求体量，目前固定40M；
2. 尝试降低模型输入max_tokens或批处理大小batch_size，具体版本根据实际情况选择，示例链接为2.2RC1版本；
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/mindie/22RC1/mindiellm/llmdev/mindie_service0285.html
attribute.cause_en: The shared memory space is insufficient
attribute.description_en: The size of a single or multiple requests entered by the user exceeds the shared memory size set for the service.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the size of the shared memory (/dev/shm) allocated by the system meets the requested volume. Currently, it is fixed at 40M.
2. Try reducing the model input max_tokens or batch size batch_size. Choose the specific version according to the actual situation, for example, the link provided is for version 2.2RC1.
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/mindie/22RC1/mindiellm/llmdev/mindie_service0285.html

attribute.cause_zh: 推理模型后端初始化失败
attribute.description_zh: 服务化后端模型初始化失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看服务化或其他模块日志中的错误，或联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to initialize the inference model backend
attribute.description_en: The backend model of serving fails to be initialized.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the errors in the logs of servitization or other modules, or contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 用户输入请求体中的model字段不正确。
suggestion_zh: 1. 尝试将请求体中的modelname改为正确的解决；
attribute.cause_en: Incorrect model name requested by the Triton interface
attribute.description_en: The model field in the request body is incorrect.
suggestion_en: 1. Change the modelname of the request body to the correct one.

attribute.description_zh: libmindieservice_llm_engine.so文件权限不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 尝试修改libmindieservice_llm_engine.so文件权限为440解决；
attribute.description_en: The permission on the libmindieservice_llm_engine.so file is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Change the permission of the libmindieservice_llm_engine.so file to 440.

attribute.cause_zh: 推理请求参数校验失败
attribute.description_zh: 请求参数不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 建议检查请求参数，尝试按照用户手册描述正确填写参数解决；
2. 具体版本根据实际情况选择，示例链接为2.2RC1版本；
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/mindie/22RC1/mindieservice/servicedev/mindie_service0062.html
attribute.cause_en: Failed to verify the inference request parameters
attribute.description_en: Invalid request parameter.
suggestion_en: 1. It is recommended to check the request parameters and try to fill them out correctly according to the user manual.
2. Choose the specific version based on the actual situation; for example, the link provided is for version 2.2RC1.
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/mindie/22RC1/mindieservice/servicedev/mindie_service0062.html

attribute.cause_zh: 多机推理master心跳检测失败
attribute.description_zh: 双边网络断连, 或子进程被kill，访问不到子节点心跳。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查节点间网络状态，是否处于连接状态；
2. 检查子进程状态，是否被kill了；
3. 若问题无法解决，联系技术人员支持；
attribute.cause_en: Master heartbeat detection failure in multi-node inference
attribute.description_en: The network is disconnected or the sub-process is killed. As a result, the heartbeat of the sub-node cannot be accessed.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the network status between nodes to see if they are connected.
2. Check the status of the subprocess to see if it has been killed.
3. If the issue cannot be resolved, contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 多机推理GRPC安全认证失败
attribute.description_zh: 证书秘钥等配置错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: GRPC security authentication failed for multi-machine inference
attribute.description_en: The certificate key is incorrectly configured.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: IBIS请求推理异常，推理子进程返回结果缺失关键张量属性
attribute.description_zh: 推理子进程返回结果缺失关键张量属性。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: IBIS inference request error, key tensor attributes missing in the result returned by the inference subprocess
attribute.description_en: Key tensor attributes are missing in the result returned by the inference subprocess.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 推理超时。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The inference times out.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: Server组件调用llm_infer_engine组件的管理接口时出现异常
attribute.description_zh: 此异常一般是由于模型还没拉起就进行管理信息查询导致的。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: An exception occurred when the Server component called the management interface of the llm_infer_engine component
attribute.description_en: This exception is generally caused by attempting to query management information before the model has been fully initialized.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: benchmark与服务端建立连接失败
attribute.description_zh: benchmark设置的http地址错误/错误使用https协议/通过管理端口检测到服务端异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 将benchmark的命令行参数http设置为server的业务ip；
2. 若服务端使用https通信，将命令行参数Http设置为https类型，并在benchmark的config.json中配置ssl文件的路径；
3. 将benchmark的命令行参数ModelName设置为server的config.json中的modelName；
attribute.cause_en: Benchmark failed to connect to the server
attribute.description_en: The HTTP address set by the benchmark is incorrect, the HTTPS protocol is incorrectly used, or the management port detects that the server is abnormal.
suggestion_en: 1. Set the command line parameter of benchmark parameter http to the service IP address of the server.
2. If the server uses HTTPS for communication, set the Http parameter to HTTPS and configure the path of the SSL file in the config.json file of the benchmark.
3. Set the benchmark command line parameter ModelName to modelName in the config.json file of the server.

attribute.description_zh: 结果文件保存路径错误/输出精度测试结果时当前dataset类型不支持精度测试。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据文档查看benchmark支持的精度测试数据集，不支持的数据集不可将参数TestAccurracy设置为True；
2. 输出文件路径设置为非软链接的路径，属组应当与当前用户一致；
attribute.cause_en: Benchmark failed to output the processing result
attribute.description_en: The path for saving the result file is incorrect. The current dataset type does not support the precision test when the precision test result is output.
suggestion_en: 1. View the precision test data sets supported by the benchmark according to the document. Do not set TestAccurracy to True for the unsupported data sets.
2. Set the output file path to a path that is not a soft link. The owner group must be the same as the current user.

attribute.description_zh: 服务端返回无法解析的消息体。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Benchmark failed to parse the server message
attribute.description_en: The server returns a message body that cannot be parsed.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: benchmark的engine模式的参数校验失败
attribute.description_zh: server的config.json的batch size设置过大。
suggestion_zh: 1. 尝试修改server的config.json中的maxBatchSize，使其为在区间[1, 5000]中的整数解决；
attribute.cause_en: Parameters of Benchmark in engine mode failed to be verified
attribute.description_en: The batch size in the config.json file of the server is too large.
suggestion_en: 1. Change the value of maxBatchSize in the config.json file of the server to the value of integer in the range [1, 5000].

attribute.description_zh: MindIE-Service的installpath设置错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 若为默认安装位置，则输入命令：source /usr/local/Ascend/mindie/set_env.sh；
2. 若自定义安装，则找到mindie安装路径，输入命令：source mindie/set_env.sh；
attribute.description_en: installpath of MindIE Service is incorrectly set.
suggestion_en: 1. If the value is default installation location, run the source set_env.sh command.
2. If the value is custom installation, find the mindie install path and run the source mindie/set_env.sh; command.

attribute.description_zh: 以https协议启动client时，ssl文件校验失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. client的ssl_options的输入必须包含ca_certs、certfile和keyfile三种文件，文件的权限必须是600或400；
attribute.description_en: When the client is started using HTTPS, the SSL file fails to be verified.
suggestion_en: 1. The ssl_options parameter of the client must contain ca_certs, certfile, and keyfile files. The permission on all files must be 600 or 400.

attribute.cause_zh: client推理接口参数校验失败
attribute.description_zh: 推理request id长度超长/初始化client的通信协议与推理的url参数不一致/推理url参数类型错误/推理输入参数prompt类型错误。
suggestion_zh: 1. 尝试控制request id的长度小于1000；
2. 若不使能client的ssl，url必须是http类型，否则是https类型；
3. 推理url参数应当是string类型；
4. 根据推理接口的文档设置输入参数prompt类型；
attribute.cause_en: Parameters of the client inference API failed to be verified
attribute.description_en: The inference request ID is too long. The communication protocol for initializing the client is inconsistent with the inference URL parameter. The inference URL parameter type is incorrect. The type of the inference input parameter prompt is incorrect.
suggestion_en: 1. The length of the request ID is less than 1000.
2. If SSL is not enabled on the client, the URL must be of the HTTP type. Otherwise, the URL must be of the HTTPS type.
3. The inferred URL parameter should be of string type.
4. Set the input parameter prompt type according to the reasoning interface documentation.

attribute.description_zh: 不存在url对应的服务资源/与服务端通信请求超时。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据服务端的业务ip和管理ip，设置client的url；
2. 查看server的故障，根据故障模式库处理；
3. 若无法解决，请联系华为工程师定位排查；
attribute.cause_en: The client fails to communicate with the server
attribute.description_en: The service resource corresponding to the URL does not exist. The communication with the server times out.
suggestion_en: 1. Set the URL of the client based on the service IP address and management IP address of the server.
2. Check the server fault and rectify the fault based on the fault mode library.
3. If the fault persists, contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 协程池大小校验失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 尝试设置协程池大小参数greenlet_size设置为在范围[1, 1e9]的整数解决；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to initialize the client coroutine pool
attribute.description_en: Failed to verify the coroutine pool size.
suggestion_en: 1. Attempt to set the coroutine pool size parameter greenlet_size to integer in the range [1, 1e9];

attribute.cause_zh: client的自研token推理接口启动失败
attribute.description_zh: token推理接口的token数据类型不正确。
suggestion_zh: 1. 尝试将自研token推理接口的输入设置为numpy.ndarray类型解决；
attribute.cause_en: The self-developed token inference API of the client fails to be started
attribute.description_en: The token data type of the token inference API is incorrect.
suggestion_en: 1. Try to set the input type of the self-developed token inference interface to numpy.ndarray.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型输入信息设置失败
attribute.description_zh: 输入数据类型和形状不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to set the model input information
attribute.description_en: The input data type and shape are invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 模型信息不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The model information is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 模型输出非法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to set the model output
attribute.description_en: The model output is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型运行时：输入校验失败
attribute.description_zh: 输入不合法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Invalid input.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型运行时：模型执行失败
attribute.description_zh: 手动构造的模型未初始化。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The manually constructed model is not initialized.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型加载：模型路径校验错误
attribute.description_zh: 传入的模型路径非法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Model loading: model path verification error
attribute.description_en: The input model path is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型加载：模型信息解析错误
attribute.description_zh: 内存中的模型存在非法信息。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Model loading: model information parsing error
attribute.description_en: The model in the memory contains invalid information.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型运行时：模型信息读取失败
attribute.description_zh: 查询信息时的入参非法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Model running: failed to read model information
attribute.description_en: The input parameter for querying information is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型运行时：模型输入输出设置或读取失败
attribute.description_zh: 设置或查询时的入参非法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Model running: failed to set or read the model input and output
attribute.description_en: The input parameter for setting or query is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型运行时：模型执行失败
attribute.description_zh: 未正确设置模型输入输出。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The model input and output are not correctly set.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 传入的上下文指针为空。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Context operation failure on the device
attribute.description_en: The input context pointer is null.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 传入的Device编号非法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The input device ID is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 传入的内存指针大小非法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The size of the input memory pointer is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 传入的流指针非法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Stream operation failure on the device
attribute.description_en: The input stream pointer is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 传入参数值不在有效范围内/传入参数类型不匹配/传入参数长度不合法/文件及文件路径校验类错误/不符合约束。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看故障日志，若报错显示[Parameteris invalid. len=XX]，则根据提示检查请求下发的参数长度、类型等是否合法；
attribute.description_en: The input parameter value is not within the valid range. The input parameter type does not match. The input parameter length is invalid. The file and file path verification fails. The file and file path do not meet the constraints.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the fault log. If the error message displays [Parameter is invalid. len=XX], verify whether the length and type of the parameters in the request are valid according to the prompt.

attribute.description_zh: config文件关键字段为空或非法/config文件格式错误无法解析。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看故障日志，若报错显示[Config parameter err.size=XX]，则根据提示检查模型初始化时config中参数范围、格式是否配置正确；
attribute.cause_en: The config file is incorrectly configured
attribute.description_en: The key field in the config file is empty or invalid, or the format of the config file is incorrect and cannot be parsed.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the error log. If the error message displays [Config parameter err.size=XX], verify according to the prompt whether the parameter range and format in the config during model initialization are correctly configured.

attribute.description_zh: 硬件形态/系统环境（OS/内存/软件包）/算子不支持或者显存溢出。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看故障日志，若报错显示[Torch exec err.ret=XX]，则根据提示检查环境、硬件形态、算子是否支持；
attribute.description_en: Hardware form/System environment (OS/memory/software package)/Operator not supported or GPU memory overflow.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the fault log. If the error message displays [Torch exec err.ret=XX], check the environment, hardware configuration, and whether the operator is supported according to the prompt.

attribute.description_zh: 权重文件不存在或者格式或内容异常/Config文件参数不正确。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看故障日志，若报错显示[Model init err.ret=XX]，则根据提示检查pipeline入参是否配置正确；
2. 检查模型权重是否存在；
3. 检查权重格式和内容是否正常；
attribute.description_en: The weight file does not exist, or the format or content is abnormal. The parameters in the config file are incorrect.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the fault log. If the error message displays [Model init err.ret=XX], verify whether the pipeline input parameters are configured correctly according to the prompt.
2. Check if the model weights exist.
3. Check whether the weight format and content are normal.

attribute.description_zh: 硬件类型不支持/算子不支持或者出错/版本不匹配/显存溢出。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看故障日志，若报错显示[Model exec err.ret=XX]，则根据提示，检查请求下发的参数是否合法；
2. 检查硬件/算子是否支持支持；
attribute.description_en: The hardware type is not supported. The operator is not supported or incorrect. The version does not match. An out of memory (OOM) exception occurs.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the fault log. If the error message displays [Model exec err.ret=XX], check whether the parameters in the request are valid according to the prompt.
2. Check whether the hardware/operator is supported.

attribute.cause_zh: 框架报错ranktable配置文件错误
attribute.description_zh: 使用rank table方式启动分布式任务，配置文件错误（rank_table_xxx.json）或者配置与环境不一致。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查配置文件（rank_table_xxx.json）内容是否正确，是否与环境匹配；
2. 检查配置中的device_id或rank_id配置是否正确，是否有重复、遗漏、超出范围（超出0-7）；
3. 检查配置中设置的device_id在环境中是否存在此设备；
4. 报错中尝试查找'invalid Reason'，如果能找到会给出一些详细的错误原因；
5. Ascend HCCL:EI0004 错误码说明：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/800/developmentguide/hccl/hcclug/hcclug_000033.html
attribute.cause_en: The framework reports an error indicating that the ranktable configuration file is incorrect
attribute.description_en: When a distributed task is started in rank table mode, the configuration file (rank_table_xxx.json) is incorrect or the configuration is inconsistent with that in the environment.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the configuration file (rank_table_xxx.json) content is correct and matches the environment.
2. Check whether the value of device_id or rank_id in the configuration is correct and whether the value is duplicate, missing, or out of range (0-7).
3. Check whether the device_id set in the configuration exists in the environment.
4. Search for 'invalid reason' in the error message. If the 'invalid reason' can be found, some detailed error causes will be provided.

in: The ranktable or rank is invalid
The collective communication operator has an invalid argument

attribute.description_zh:
内存占用过多导致分配内存失败，可能原因有：batch_size的值设置过大、引入了异常大的Parameter，例如： 
  例如单个数据shape为[640,1024,80,81]，数据类型为float32，单个数据大小超过15G，两个如此大小的数据相加时，占用内存超过3*15G，容易造成Out of Memory。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查batch_size的值，尝试将batch_size的值设置减小；
2. 检查参数的shape，尝试减少shape；
attribute.cause_en: The task has encountered a memory-related fault pattern. Please refer to the following memory allocation details.
attribute.description_en:
Statistics on memory allocation details. The log format is as follows: 
Mem stats(Bytes). (module_name=[module name]; module_id=[module id]; current_alloced_size=[Current Allocated Memory Size of the Module in Bytes];alloced_peak_size=[Peak Allocated Memory Size of the Module]; alloc_cnt=[Number of Memory Allocations by the Module]; free_cnt=[Number of Memory Releases by the Module])
suggestion_en: 1. Check the value of batch_size and try to decrease the value of batch_size.
2. Check the shape of the parameter and try to reduce the shape.

attribute.cause_zh: 任务出现内存相关故障模式，请参考如下内存申请详情
attribute.description_zh:
统计内存申请详情。日志格式如下：
  [内存属性] Mem stats(Bytes). (module_name=[模块名]; module_id=[模块id]; current_alloced_size=[该模块当前已占用的内存大小Bytes]; alloced_peak_size=[该模块已占用的内存峰值大小]; alloc_cnt=[该模块申请内存次数]; free_cnt=[该模块释放内存次数])
suggestion_zh: 1. 对比各组件申请内存量，查看是哪个组件申请的内存过多，并减少内存使用；
attribute.description_en:
The value of batch_size is too large, or a parameter with an excessively large value is introduced. For example,
if the shape of a single data record is [640,1024,80,81], the data type is float32, and the size of a single data record exceeds 15 GB, the occupied memory will exceed 3 x 15 GB when two data records of such a size are added, which may cause out of memory.
suggestion_en: 1. Compare the amount of memory applied by each component, check which component has applied for too much memory, and reduce the memory usage.

attribute.description_zh: CANN {}组件上报{}故障码
suggestion_zh: 1. CANN组件上报故障码，建议参考CANN官方文档中对应ERROR CODE的案例解决，Error Code介绍：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/800/developmentguide/maintenref/troubleshooting/troubleshooting_0225.html
2. 若无法解决，请联系华为工程师定位排查；
attribute.description_en: The CANN {} component reports the {} fault code.
suggestion_en: 1. If the CANN component reports a fault code, rectify the fault by referring to the corresponding error code in the official documents of CANN.

attribute.description_zh: PyTorch {} 模块上报 {} 故障码。
suggestion_zh: 1. PyTorch上报故障码，建议参考PyTorch官方文档中对应Error Code的案例解决，Error Code介绍：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/Pytorch/600/comref/troubleshooting/trbst_0003.html
2. 若无法解决，请联系华为工程师定位排查；
attribute.description_en: The PyTorch {} module reports the error code {}.
suggestion_en: 1. PyTorch reports a fault code. It is advised to rectify the fault by referring to the corresponding error code case in the PyTorch official document.

attribute.description_zh: MindIE上报错误码：{}。
suggestion_zh: 1. MindIE上报错误码，建议参考MindIE官方文档中对应错误码的案例解决，错误码参考：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/mindie/20RC2/ref/errorcodereference/mindie_log_0072.html
2. 若无法解决，请联系华为工程师定位排查；
attribute.description_en: MindIE reports the error code {}.
suggestion_en: 1. MindIE reports an error code. It is advised to rectify the fault by referring to the corresponding error code in MindIE official documentation.

attribute.description_en: The cable is incorrectly connected or faulty.

attribute.description_zh: CPU降频导致系统性能降低。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查服务器是否存在进风口/出风口高温告警；
2. 检查服务器是否存在风扇告警；
3. 检查服务器是否已安装导风罩；
4. 检查是否正确安装CPU散热器或液冷装置；
5. 更换对应的CPU；
6. 更换主板；
7. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: CPU overheating will trigger frequency reduction
attribute.description_en: CPU throttling leads to reduced system performance.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the server has high-temperature alarms at the air intake or exhaust vents.
2. Check whether there is a fan alarm on the server.
3. Check whether the air duct has been installed on the server.
4. Check whether the CPU cooler or liquid cooling system is properly installed.
5. Replace the corresponding CPU.
6. Replace the motherboard.
7. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: CPU性能降低。
suggestion_zh: 1. 更换告警的CPU；
2. 更换主板；
3. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: CPU performance degradation.
suggestion_en: 1. Replace the corresponding CPU.
2. Replace the motherboard.
3. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可用CPU减少。
suggestion_zh: 1. 更换告警的CPU；
2. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Decreased available CPU.
suggestion_en: 1. Replace the corresponding CPU.
2. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: CPU性能降低。
suggestion_zh: 1. 更换告警的CPU；
2. 更换主板；
3. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: CPU performance degradation.
suggestion_en: 1. Replace the corresponding CPU.
2. Replace the motherboard.
3. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致系统性能降低。
suggestion_zh: 1. 优先更换报错内存条；
2. 更换报错的内存板，如系统不存在内存板，则直接更换出错内存条所在的主板；
3. 对于告警信息中没有指定具体故障内存条的，属于Channel故障；
4. 若更换内存条和主板后仍然出现相同的错误，则更换内存对应的CPU；
5. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May lead to reduced system performance.
suggestion_en: 1. Prioritize replacing the faulty memory module.
2. Replace the faulty memory board. If the system does not have a memory board, replace the motherboard where the faulty memory module is located.
3. If the alarm information does not specify the faulty memory module, it is considered a channel fault.
4. If the same error persists after replacing the memory module and motherboard, replace the CPU corresponding to the memory.
5. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致系统性能降低。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查指定内存条有没有其它的告警信息，优先处理其他告警；
2. 若没有其他内存相关告警，请检查内存型号及插法情况符合要求；
3. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May lead to reduced system performance.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether there are any other alarm messages for the specified memory module, and prioritize handling other alarms.
2. If there are no other memory-related alarms, please check that the memory model and installation method meet the requirements.
3. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 硬盘故障，可能导致相关业务无法正常运行或数据丢失。
suggestion_zh: 1. 更换硬盘；
2. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Related services may fail to run properly or data may be lost.
suggestion_en: 1. Replace hard disk.
2. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致系统停止响应或数据丢失。
suggestion_zh: 1. 日志中查看硬盘信息，是否存在硬盘不在位；
2. 是否存在硬盘故障告警或者硬盘拔出事件；
3. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May cause the system to stop responding or result in data loss.
suggestion_en: 1. Check the hard drive information in the log to see if there is any hard drive not detected.
2. Check hard disk failure alarm or hard disk removal event.
3. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致相关业务无法正常运行或数据丢失。
suggestion_zh: 1. 一键收集日志的fdm.log或者fdm_output中查看fdm日志；
2. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Related services may fail to run properly or data may be lost.
suggestion_en: 1. View the FDM logs in fdm.log or fdm_output by collecting logs with one click.
2. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 系统仍能正常运行，但可靠性有所降低。
suggestion_zh: 1. PCIe/NVMe接口的硬盘与插槽存在损坏或接触不良现象；
2. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Hard drive CE class hard failure
attribute.description_en: The system can still operate normally, but its reliability has been reduced.
suggestion_en: 1. The PCIe/NVMe interface hard drive and its slot are damaged or have poor contact.
2. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 硬盘故障，可能导致相关业务无法正常运行或数据丢失。
suggestion_zh: 1. 硬盘或RAID卡操作不当；
2. 硬盘故障；
3. web存储管理页面收集RAID卡日志，联系RAID卡工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Related services may fail to run properly or data may be lost.
suggestion_en: 1. Improper operation of the hard drive or RAID card.
2. Hard disk drive failure.
3. On the web storage management page, collect RAID card logs and contact the RAID card engineer for further handling.

attribute.description_zh: 硬盘故障，可能导致相关业务无法正常运行或数据丢失。
suggestion_zh: 1. 外来硬盘已有逻辑关系；
2. web存储管理页面收集RAID卡日志，联系RAID卡同事定位；
attribute.cause_en: The hard drive has external configuration
attribute.description_en: Related services may fail to run properly or data may be lost.
suggestion_en: 1. External hard drive has logical relationships.
2. On the web storage management page, collect RAID card logs and contact the RAID card engineer for further handling.

attribute.description_zh: 硬盘故障，可能导致相关业务无法正常运行或数据丢失。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看告警页面是否存在硬盘背板高速线缆告警或者硬盘故障告警；
2. web存储管理页面收集RAID卡日志，联系RAID卡同事定位；
attribute.cause_en: Failed to identify the hard disk indicator
attribute.description_en: Related services may fail to run properly or data may be lost.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether there is an alarm for the high-speed cable of the drive backplane or a drive failure alarm on the alarm page.
2. On the web storage management page, collect RAID card logs and contact the RAID card engineer for further handling.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致系统停止响应或数据丢失。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看告警页面是否存在硬盘背板高速线缆告警或者硬盘故障告警；
2. 近端查看硬盘是否插好；
3. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May cause the system to stop responding or result in data loss.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether there is an alarm for the high-speed cable of the drive backplane or a drive failure alarm on the alarm page.
2. Check if the hard drive is properly connected at the near end.
3. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致PCIe卡运行不稳定，系统停止响应。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看fdm_log日志中是否存在对应记录；
2. PCIe卡故障；
3. 主板故障；
4. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May cause the PCIe card to operate unstably, and the system to stop responding.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the corresponding record exists in the fdm_log file.
2. The PCIe card failure.
3. Motherboard failure.
4. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: PCIE标卡温度过高一般告警
attribute.description_zh: 温度过高会导致PCIe设备运行不稳定。如果告警一直存在，可能导致PCIe卡相关业务无法正常运行。
suggestion_zh: 1. 通过BMC一键收集日志查看日志中sync_property_trace.log对应告警读数是否存在异常值；
2. 查看cooling_control.log日志中风扇是否正常调速；
3. 服务器进风口/出风口堵塞；
4. PCIe卡故障；
5. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: PCIe card temperature too high general alarm
attribute.description_en: Excessive temperature can cause the PCIe device to operate unstably. If the alarm persists, it may lead to the failure of PCIe card-related services to function properly.
suggestion_en: 1. Use the BMC one-click log collection function to check whether there are any abnormal values in the alarm readings corresponding to sync_property_trace.log in the logs.
2. Check whether the fan speed adjustment is normal in the cooling_control.log file.
3. Server air intake/exhaust blockage.
4. The PCIe card failure.
5. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致PCIe卡运行不稳定，系统运行异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 通过BMC一键收集日志查看日志中sync_property_trace.log对应告警读数是否存在异常值；
2. PCIe卡故障；
3. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May cause the PCIe card to operate unstably and the system to run abnormally.
suggestion_en: 1. Use the BMC one-click log collection function to check whether there are any abnormal values in the alarm readings corresponding to sync_property_trace.log in the logs.
2. The PCIe card failure.
3. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致系统停止响应。
suggestion_zh: 1. 通过BMC一键收集日志查看日志中sync_property_trace.log对应告警读数是否存在异常值；
2. RAID标卡故障；
3. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May cause the system to stop responding.
suggestion_en: 1. Use the BMC one-click log collection function to check whether there are any abnormal values in the alarm readings corresponding to sync_property_trace.log in the logs.
2. RAID Card Failure.
3. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 导致PCIe卡运行不稳定，系统运行异常。
suggestion_zh: 1. 通通过BMC一键收集日志查看日志中sync_property_trace.log对应告警读数是否存在异常值；
2. PCIe卡故障；
3. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Causes unstable operation of the PCIe card and abnormal system performance.
suggestion_en: 1. Use the BMC one-click log collection function to check whether there are any abnormal values in the alarm readings corresponding to sync_property_trace.log in the logs.
2. The PCIe card failure.
3. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 系统仍能正常运行，但性能有所降低。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看fdm_log日志中是否存在对应记录；
2. PCIE卡与插槽可能存在损坏或接触不良现象；
3. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The system can still operate normally, but its performance has been reduced.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the corresponding record exists in the fdm_log file.
2. The PCIe card and its slot may be damaged or have poor contact.
3. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致RAID卡运行不稳定或故障，系统停止响应。
suggestion_zh: 1. 通过BMC一键收集日志查看日志中sync_property_trace.log对应告警读数是否存在异常值；
2. RAID卡初始化异常；
3. RAID卡故障；
4. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: The communication between the RAID controller card and the controller is lost.
attribute.description_en: The RAID controller card may be unstable or faulty, and the system may stop responding.
suggestion_en: 1. Use the BMC one-click log collection function to check whether there are any abnormal values in the alarm readings corresponding to sync_property_trace.log in the logs.
2. RAID card initialization error.
3. The PCIe card failure.
4. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 系统仍能正常运行，但性能有所降低。
suggestion_zh: 1. 通过BMC一键收集日志查看日志中sync_property_trace.log对应告警读数是否存在异常值
2. PCIe卡与插槽可能存在损坏或接触不良现象；
3. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: The system can still operate normally, but its performance has been reduced.
suggestion_en: 1. Use the BMC one-click log collection function to check whether there are any abnormal values in the alarm readings corresponding to sync_property_trace.log in the logs.
2. The PCIe card and its slot may be damaged or have poor contact.
3. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致系统停止响应。
suggestion_zh: 1. 查看fdm_log日志中是否存在对应记录
2. 网卡PCIe链路故障；
3. 网卡芯片故障；
4. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May cause the system to stop responding.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the corresponding record exists in the fdm_log file.
2. NIC PCIe Link Failure.
3. Network card chip failure.
4. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 网卡扣卡温度过高一般告警
attribute.description_zh: 温度过高会导致网卡运行异常，影响网络业务。
suggestion_zh: 1. 通过BMC一键收集日志查看日志中sync_property_trace.log对应告警读数是否存在异常值
2. 查看cooling_control.log日志中风扇是否正常调速；
3. 进风口/出风口堵塞；
4. 网卡故障；
5. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Excessive temperature can cause the network card to operate abnormally, affecting network services.
suggestion_en: 1. Use the BMC one-click log collection function to check whether there are any abnormal values in the alarm readings corresponding to sync_property_trace.log in the logs.
2. Check whether the fan speed adjustment is normal in the cooling_control.log file.
3. Air intake/exhaust blockage.
4. Network card failure.
5. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致系统停止响应或无法正常启动。
suggestion_zh: 1. 更换CPU板
2. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May cause the system to stop responding or fail to start properly.
suggestion_en: 1. Replace the CPU board.
2. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致系统停止响应。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May cause the system to stop responding.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致系统停止响应。
suggestion_zh: 1. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May cause the system to stop responding.
suggestion_en: 1. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 可能导致系统停止响应。
suggestion_zh: 1. ADC电路异常；
2. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: May cause the system to stop responding.
suggestion_en: 1. The ADC circuit is abnormal.
2. Contact technical support.

attribute.description_zh: 导致此网口相关业务中断。
suggestion_zh: 1. 重新拔插网线；
2. 检查网线是否连接到交换机；
3. 检查交换机工作是否正常；
4. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.description_en: Causes service interruption related to this network port.
suggestion_en: 1. Reconnect the network cable.
2. Check if the network cable is connected to the switch.
3. Check if the switch is working properly.
4. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 网卡网口link down严重告警
attribute.description_zh: 导致此网口相关业务中断。
suggestion_zh: 1. 重新拔插网线；
2. 检查网线是否连接到交换机；
3. 检查交换机工作是否正常；
4. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: Network adapter network port link down major alarm
attribute.description_en: Causes service interruption related to this network port.
suggestion_en: 1. Reconnect the network cable.
2. Check if the network cable is connected to the switch.
3. Check if the switch is working properly.
4. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: CPU多BIT ECC错误导致快速系统复位
attribute.description_zh: 导致服务器业务中断。
suggestion_zh: 1. 如果频繁出现，请更换主板；
2. 请联系华为工程师处理；
attribute.cause_en: CPU multi-bit ECC error causes rapid system reset
attribute.description_en: Causing server service interruption.
suggestion_en: 1. If this occurs frequently, please replace the motherboard.
2. Contact technical support.

attribute.cause_zh: 原模型中不存在AMCT处理的层
attribute.description_zh: 模型异常，原模型中不存在AMCT处理的层。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据资料的可量化算子的类型和规格范围，检查被量化模型中是否有可量化算子，如无可量化算子，则说明该模型无需量化；
attribute.cause_en: The original model does not contain layers processed by AMCT
attribute.description_en: The model is abnormal. The original model does not contain the layer processed by AMCT.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the quantifiable operator exists in the quantized model according to the type and specification range of the quantifiable operator of the data. If no quantifiable operator exists, it indicates that the model does not need to be quantized.

attribute.cause_zh: 模型中含有AMCT自定义的算子层
attribute.description_zh: 模型异常，模型中含有AMCT自定义的算子层。
suggestion_zh: 1. 检查被量化模型中是否含有AMCT的自定义层：AscendQuant,AscendDeQuant等类型算子，如果有，则说明该模型已经被AMCT处理过，不需要再次量化；
attribute.cause_en: The model contains the AMCT custom operator layer
attribute.description_en: The model is abnormal. The model contains the AMCT-defined operator layer.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the quantized model contains the AMCT user-defined layers. If yes, the model has been processed by the AMCT and does not need to be quantized again.

in: Graph with quantized layer is not supported

attribute.cause_zh: 简易配置文件中指定量化层/算子类型不支持量化
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，简易配置文件中指定量化层/算子类型不支持量化。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，检查文件中指定的算子类型/层名是否支持量化，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: In the simplified configuration file, the quantization layer or operator type does not support quantization
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. In the simplified configuration file, the specified quantization layer or operator type does not support quantization.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the operator type/layer name specified in the file supports quantization based on the error information. If the operator type/layer name supports quantization, modify the operator type/layer name and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: ACL压缩优化功能配置文件含有未知关键字
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，ACL压缩优化功能配置文件含有未知关键字。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，结合资料检查文件中是否有未知关键字，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: The configuration file for ACL compression and optimization contains unknown keywords
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. The configuration file for ACL compression optimization contains unknown keywords.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the file contains unknown keywords based on the error information and documentation. If yes, modify the file and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: ACL压缩优化功能配置文件中input_shape参数未配置或shape值含有非数字
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，ACL压缩优化功能配置文件中input_shape参数未配置或shape值含有非数字。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，结合资料检查文件中input_shape配置是否正确，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: The input_shape parameter is not configured or the shape value contains non-digit characters in the configuration file for ACL compression and optimization
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. The input_shape parameter in the configuration file for ACL compression optimization is not configured or the shape value contains non-digit characters.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the input_shape configuration in the file is correct based on the error information and documents. If the configuration is incorrect, modify the configuration and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: ACL压缩优化功能配置文件中某个配置值为空
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，ACL压缩优化功能配置文件中某个配置值为空。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，结合资料检查文件中配置值是否为空，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: A configuration item in the configuration file for ACL compression and optimization is empty
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. A configuration value in the configuration file for ACL compression optimization is empty.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the configuration value in the file is empty based on the error information and documents. If yes, modify the configuration and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: ACL压缩优化功能配置文件中配置值中对应节点未在graph中
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，ACL压缩优化功能配置文件中配置值中对应节点未在graph中。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，结合资料检查文件中配置的节点是否在图中，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: The corresponding node in the configuration file for ACL compression and optimization is not in the graph
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. The node corresponding to the configuration value in the configuration file for ACL compression optimization does not exist in the graph.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the node configured in the file is in the figure based on the error information and documentation. If the node is incorrect, modify the node and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: ACL压缩优化功能配置文件中soc_version配置与实际执行环境不一致
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，ACL压缩优化功能配置文件中soc_version配置与实际执行环境不一致。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，检查文件中soc_version与指定环境是否一致，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: The soc_version  in the configuration file for ACL compression and optimization is inconsistent with that in the actual execution environment
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. The soc_version value in the configuration file for ACL compression optimization is inconsistent with that in the actual execution environment.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether soc_version in the file is the same as that in the specified environment based on the error information. If yes, modify it and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: ACL压缩优化功能配置文件中soc_version配置值为不支持的型号
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，ACL压缩优化功能配置文件中soc_version配置值为不支持的型号。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，结合资料检查文件中的soc_version是否在支持范围，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: The soc_version value in the configuration file for ACL compression and optimization is not supported
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. The soc_version value in the configuration file for ACL compression optimization is not supported.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether soc_version in the file is supported based on the error information and documentation. If yes, modify it and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: ACL接口配置参数中soc_version配置值为空字符串
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，ACL接口配置参数中soc_version配置值为空字符串。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，结合资料检查参数配置中的soc_version是否为空字符串，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: The value of soc_version in ACL interface configuration parameters is an empty string
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. The value of soc_version under ACL interface parameters is an empty string.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether soc_version in parameter configuration is an empty character string based on the error information and documentation. If yes, modify it and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: ACL接口配置参数中配置的device_id为非法值
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，ACL接口配置参数中配置的device_id为非法值。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，结合资料检查参数配置中的device_id是否为非法值，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: The value of device_id in ACL interface configuration parameters is invalid
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. The value of device_id under ACL interface parameters is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the value of device_id in parameter configuration is invalid based on the error information and documentation. If yes, modify the value and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: ACL接口配置参数中设置的日志等级非法
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，ACL接口配置参数中设置的日志等级非法。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，结合资料检查参数配置中的日志等级是否为非法值，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: The log level set in ACL interface configuration parameters is invalid
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. The log level set by ACL interface parameters is invalid.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the log level in the parameter configuration file is invalid based on the error information and documentation. If yes, modify the log level and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: ACL接口配置参数中配置的校准集文件为空或打开失败
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，ACL接口配置参数中配置的校准集文件为空或打开失败。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据报错信息，检查参数配置中的校准集路径是否正确，文件是否存在，是否可用，如有问题则修改后再尝试；
attribute.cause_en: The calibration dataset file set in the ACL interface parameters is empty or fails to be opened
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. The calibration dataset file set by ACL interface parameters is empty or fails to be opened.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the calibration dataset path in the parameter configuration file is correct, whether the file exists, and whether the file is available based on the error information. If the file is incorrect, modify the file and try again.

attribute.cause_zh: 简易配置文件解析后，图中为无可量化层
attribute.description_zh: 文件内容错误，简易配置文件解析后，图中为无可量化层。
suggestion_zh: 1. 根据资料的可量化算子的类型和规格范围，检查模型中是否含有可量化算子，如果没有可量化算子，则说明该模型无需量化；
2. 如果含有可量化算子，检查简易配置文件中是否配置跳过了这些可量化算子，根据实际需求修改简易配置文件或者终止量化流程；
attribute.cause_en: After the simple configuration file is parsed, no layer can be quantized in the graph
attribute.description_en: The file content is incorrect. After the simplified configuration file is parsed, no layer can be quantized.
suggestion_en: 1. Check whether the model contains quantifiable operators based on the type and specification range of quantifiable operators. If no quantifiable operator exists, the model does not need to be quantified.

2. If quantifiable operators are contained, check whether the simple configuration file skips these quantifiable operators. If yes, modify the simple configuration file or terminate the quantization process based on the site requirements.

in: in the graph in your configuration

attribute.cause_zh: 算子aclnn接口入参空指针配置
attribute.description_zh: 输入错误，算子aclnn接口入参空指针配置。
suggestion_zh: 1. 参数不支持传空指针，请参考文档：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/800/apiref/aolapi/operatorlist_00012.html
attribute.cause_en: The aclnn input parameters contain a null pointer
attribute.description_en: Input error. The input parameter of the aclnn operator is a null pointer.
suggestion_en: 1. The parameter does not support a null pointer.

attribute.description_zh: 输入错误，参数入参的shape配置超范围。
suggestion_zh: 1. 超过规格范围，请参考算子清单文档：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/800/apiref/aolapi/operatorlist_00097.html
attribute.description_en: Input error. The shape of the input parameter is out of range.
suggestion_en: 1. The number exceeds the specification range.

attribute.description_zh: 输入错误，参数配置了不支持的dtype。
suggestion_zh: 1. 该数据类型不支持，请参考算子清单文档：
https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/800/apiref/aolapi/operatorlist_00097.html
attribute.description_en: Input error. The parameter is configured with an unsupported dtype.
suggestion_en: 1. The data type is not supported.
